SA20n1396:33: tatra sakale kāmadhātau rūpadhātau ca prathamadhyāne dhyānāntarika samāpattyupapattikaṃ sthāpayitvā savitarkā savicārā bhūmiḥ samāpattyupapattikaṃ dhyānāntarikamavitarkāvicāramātrā bhūmiḥ |
SA20n1396:39: kāmyebhyo'vītarāgasyāpyavitarkāvicāra ekadā manaḥpracāro bhavatyupadeśamanaskāraviśeṣataḥ vītarāgasyāpi ca vitarkavicārebhyo vitarkavicārasamudācāro bhavati |
SA20n1396:43: tatrāpi prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ savitarkā savicārā bhūmiḥ |
SA20n1396:44: vitarkavicārasthānīyeṣu dharmeṣu tathatāmavalambva tatsamāpatterno tu vikalpapracārataḥ |
SA20n1396:51: sañjīvaḥ kālasūtraṃ saṅghāto rauravo mahārauravastāpano mahātāpano'vīciśca |
SA20n1396:55: ito dvātriṃśadyo janasahasraiḥ sañjīvastataḥ pareṇa catuḥsahasrayojanāntarāṇi tadanyāni draṣṭavyāni |
SA20n1396:63: ṣaṭ kāmāvacarā devāḥ cāturmahārājakāyikāstrāyastriṃśā yāmāstuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartinaśca devāḥ |
SA20n1396:64: mārabhuvanaṃ punaḥ paranirmitavaśavartiṣu deveṣu paryāpannaṃ na sthānāntaraviśiṣṭaṃ |
SA20n1396:65: pratyekanarakāḥ sāmantanarakāśca mahānarakaśītanarakasamanta eva na sthānāntaraviśiṣṭāḥ manuṣyeṣvapyupalamyante |
SA20n1396:66: tadeke pratyekanarakāḥ yathoktaṃ sthaviramahāmaudgalyāyanena sattvamahaṃ paśyāmyādīptaṃ pradīptaṃ samprajvalitamekajvālībhūtamityevamādi |
SA20n1396:75: pañca śuddhāvāsabhūmayaḥ abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhāśca mṛdumadhyādhimātratarādhimātratamaparibhāvitatvādvyavakīrṇabhāvitasya caturthasya dhyānasya |
SA20n1396:76: śuddhāvāsāṃśca samatikramaya maheśvarasthānaṃ yatra daśabhūmisthā bodhisattvādaśamyā bhūmeḥ paribhāvitatvādutpadyante ||
SA20n1396:91: tataḥ pareṇa sarveṣu tadanyeṣu devanikāyeṣu pādapādamadhikaṃ parimāṇa draṣṭavyaṃ |
SA20n1396:95: tataḥ pareṇa tadavaśiṣṭeṣu devanikāyeṣu taddiguṇamāśrayaparimāṇaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ syāpayitvā'nabhrakān |
SA20n1396:98: yena pragāḍhataraṃ pāpakamakuśalaṃ karma kṛtaṃ bhavatyupacitaṃ tasya mahattara āśrayo nirvartate |
SA20n1396:100: yathā mahānarakeṣvevaṃ śītanarakeṣu pratyekanarakeṣu sāmantanarakeṣu pratyekanarakeṣu tiryakpreteṣu |
SA20n1396:105: jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ tāvanmanuṣyāṇāṃ triṃśadrātrakeṇa māsena dvādaśamāsakena ca saṃvatsareṇāniyatamāyuṣpramāṇaṃ |
SA20n1396:111: yat khalu manuṣyāṇāṃ pañcāśadvarṣāṇi taccāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devānāmekaṃrātrindivaṃ |
SA20n1396:112: tena rātrindivasena triṃśadrātrakeṇa māsena dvādaśamāsakena saṃvatsareṇa divyāni pañca varṣaśatānyāyuḥ |
SA20n1396:113: yatkhalu manuṣyāṇāṃ varṣaśataṃ tattu trayastriṃśānāṃ devānāmekaṃ rātrindivasaṃ |
SA20n1396:115: tadanyeṣu devanikāyeṣvahorātreṇāpi taddiguṇena teṣāṃ devānāmāyuryāvatparanirmitavaśavarttiṣu deveṣu ||
SA20n1396:116: yalkhalu cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ kṛtsnamāyustat sañjīve mahānaraka ekaṃ rātrindivasaṃ |
SA20n1396:117: tena rātrindivasena triṃśadrātrakeṇa māsena dvādaśamāsakena ca saṃvatsareṇa nārakāṇi pañcavarṣaśatānyāyuḥ |
SA20n1396:118: yathā cāturmahārājakāyikānāmāyuṣā sañjīve mahānarake upapannānāmāyurevaṃ trayastriṃśānāmāyuṣā kālasūtropapannānāmāyuḥ |
SA20n1396:131: tata ūrdhvaṃ tadanyeṣu devanikāyeṣu taddviguṇataddviguṇamāyuḥ sthāpayitvānabhrakān |
SA20n1396:138: astyantare kālakriyā tatra manuṣyeṣu tiryakpreteṣu ca kiṭṭālakāyāḥ santiṣṭhante |
SA20n1396:139: deveṣu narakeṣu ca sahaiva vijñānena akiṭṭakāyāḥ santiṣṭhante ||
SA20n1396:145: tatra narakeṣu yadbhūyasā sattvāḥ kāraṇāduḥkhaṃ pratisaṃvedayanti tiryakṣvanyonyabhakṣaṇaduḥkhaṃ |
SA20n1396:149: tatra sañjīve mahānarake evaṃrūpaṃ kāraṇāduḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti bāhulyena |
SA20n1396:150: tatra te sattvā anyonyaṃ saṅgamya karmādhipatyasambhūtairvividhaiḥ praharaṇaiḥ kramasamutpannairanyonyaṃ vipraghātikāṃ kurvanto niśceṣṭāḥ pṛthivyāṃ prapatanti |
SA20n1396:151: tata ākāśācchabdo niścarati sañjīvantu hanta sattvā iti |
SA20n1396:152: tataḥ punaste sattvā vyutthāya tenaiva prakāreṇānyonyavipraghātikāṃ kurvanti |
SA20n1396:153: tato nidānaṃ ca dīrghakālaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti yāvattatpāpakamakuśalaṃ karma sarveṇa sarvaṃ parikṣīṇaṃ vyantīkṛtaṃ |
SA20n1396:154: tasmācca punaḥ sa narakaḥ sañjīva ityucyate ||
SA20n1396:156: tatra te sattvāstatparyāpannairyātanāpuruṣaiḥ kālakena sūtreṇa māpyante |
SA20n1396:158: māpitāśca tathā tathā khanyante takṣyante sampratakṣyante |
SA20n1396:159: tato nidānaṃ ca dīrghakālaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti yāvattatpāpakamakuśalaṃ karma sarveṇa sarvaṃ na parikṣīṇaṃ bhavati vyantīkṛtaṃ |
SA20n1396:160: tasmācca punaḥ sa narakaḥ kālasūtra ityucyate ||
SA20n1396:161: tatra saṅghāte mahānaraka evaṃrūpaṃ kāraṇāduḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti bāhulyena |
SA20n1396:162: tatra te sattvā yadānyonyamaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣiptāḥ saṅghātamāpannā bhavanti tadā tatparyāpannairyātanāpuruṣairdvayorajamukhayorāyasayormahāparvatayorvivaramanupraveśyante |
SA20n1396:164: teṣāṃ prapīḍitānāṃ sarvatomukhaṃ rudhiranadyaḥ prasravanti pragharanti |
SA20n1396:166: punaḥ saṅghātamāpannā āyase mahāyantre prakṣipya prapīḍyante yathekṣukṣodaḥ |
SA20n1396:167: teṣāṃ tatra prapīḍyamānānāṃ rudhiranadyaḥ prasravanti pragharanti |
SA20n1396:168: punaḥ saṅghātamāpannānāmupariṣṭādāyasī mahāśilā pratatati yā tānsattvānayomayyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ sañchindati sambhindati saṅkaṭayati sampradālayati |
SA20n1396:169: teṣāṃ tatra tatra sañchidyamānānāṃ sambhidyamānānāṃ saṅkuṭyamānānāṃ sampradālyamānānāṃ rudhiranadyaḥ prasravanti pragharanti |
SA20n1396:170: tatonidānaṃ ca dīrghakālaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti yāvattatpāpakamakuśalaṃ karma sarveṇa sarvaṃ na parikṣīṇaṃ bhavati vyantīkṛtaṃ |
SA20n1396:171: tasmācca punaḥ sa narakaḥ saṅghāta ityucyate ||
SA20n1396:172: tatra raurave mahānaraka evaṃrūpaṃ kāraṇāduḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti bāhulyena |
SA20n1396:173: tatra te sattvā layanagaveṣiṇa āyasamagāraṃ praviśanti |
SA20n1396:174: teṣāṃ tatra praviṣṭānāmagnirmucyate yatasta ādīptāḥ pradīptāḥ samprajvalitā dhyāyanti |
SA20n1396:175: te tatra ruvantyārtasvaraṃ krandante tatonidānaṃ ca dīrghakālaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti yāvattatpāpakamakuśalaṃ karma sarveṇa sarvaṃ na parikṣīṇaṃ bhavati vyantīkṛtaṃ |
SA20n1396:176: tasmācca punaḥ sa narako raurava ityucyate ||
SA20n1396:179: gāraḥ sa tatrāgāra eva vijñātavyaḥ sagarbhastu |
SA20n1396:180: tasmācca punaḥ sa narako mahāraurava ityucyate ||
SA20n1396:181: tatra tapane mahānaraka evaṃrūpaṃ kāraṇāduḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti bāhulyena |
SA20n1396:182: tatparyāpannā yātanāpuruṣāstānsattvānanekayojanāyāṃ kaphalyāṃ prakṣipya taptāyāṃ prataptāyāṃ samprajvalitāyāmāvartayanti parivartayanti tāpayanti santāpayanti tadyathā matsyān |
SA20n1396:184: sa ca śalyaḥ pṛṣṭhāntena praviśya śirasā nirgacchatyādīptaḥ pradīptaḥ |
SA20n1396:185: teṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ mukhādakṣitārakābhyo nāsikāvilebhyaḥ sarvaromakūpebhyo jvālā nirgacchanti |
SA20n1396:186: punarayomayyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ taptāyāṃ santaptāyāṃ prajvalitāyāmuttānakānsthāpayitvāvamūrdhakān vā taptaiḥ santaptaiḥ samprajvalitairayoghanaistāḍayanti santāḍayanti sandālayanti tadyathā nāma māṃsabilvaṃ |
SA20n1396:187: tatonidānaṃ ca dīrghakālaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti yāvatpāpakamakuśalaṃ karma sarveṇa sarvaṃ na parikṣīṇaṃ bhavati vyantīkṛtaṃ |
SA20n1396:195: lauhapatraiśca taptaiḥ santaptaiḥ samprajvalitaiḥ sarvataḥ kāyaṃ pariveṣṭayanti punarayomayyāṃ mahatyāṃ lohyāṃ kvathitakṣārapūrṇāyāmādīptāyāṃ pradīptāyāṃ samprajvalitāyāṃ te sattvā ūrdhvapādā avāṅmukhāḥ prakṣipyante |
SA20n1396:198: pi gacchantastiryagapi gacchanto yataśca saṅkīrṇatvaṅmāṃsaśoṇitā bhavantyasthiśaṅkalāmātrāvaśiṣṭāḥ |
SA20n1396:203: yāvattatpāpakamakuśalaṃ karma sarveṇa sarvaṃ na parikṣīṇaṃ bhavati vyantīkṛtaṃ |
SA20n1396:204: tasmācca punaḥ sa narakaḥ pratāpana ityucyate ||
SA20n1396:205: tatrāvīcau mahānaraka evaṃ rūpaṃ kāraṇāduḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti |
SA20n1396:206: teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśyanekayojanaśatāyāḥ pṛthivyā ādīptāyāḥ pradīptāyāḥ samprajvalitāyā agnijvālāvega āgacchati yatasteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tvacaṃ bhittvā māṃsaṃ bhittvā snāyuṃ chittvāsthi bhittvāsthimajjānaṃ |
SA20n1396:209: yathā pūrvasyā diśa evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāḥ paścimāyā uttarasyā diśaḥ |
SA20n1396:212: gniskandhe te tatra vīcimapi nāsādayanti duḥkhānāṃ vedanānāṃ nānyatra ārtasvaraṃ krandanto vijñāyante sattvā iti |
SA20n1396:216: sā tathā vitatā vigatavalikā vigatapuṭikā ca tadyathārṣabhaṃ carma |
SA20n1396:217: punastasyāmevāyomayyāṃ pṛthivyāmuttānakānsthāpayitvāyomayena viṣkambhanena mukhaṃ viṣkambhayitvā dīptāḥ pradīptāḥ samprajvalitāḥ |
SA20n1396:218: ayoguḍā mukheṣu kṣipyante ye teṣāṃ mukhamapi dahanti kaṇṭhamapyantramapi dagdhvā ca punaradhobhāgena nirgacchanti |
SA20n1396:220: tacca mukhamapi dagdhvā kaṇṭhamapyantramapi dagdhvādhobhāgena dagdhvādhobhāgena pragharati |
SA20n1396:222: tatonidānaṃ punardīrghakālaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti yāvattatpāpakamakuśalaṃ karma sarveṇa sarvaṃ na parikṣīṇaṃ bhavati vyantīkṛtaṃ |
SA20n1396:226: na ca punareṣu mahānarakeṣu tadanyāni vicitrākārāṇi bahūni kāraṇāni nopalabhyante ||
SA20n1396:228: sarva ete mahānarakāścaturdiśaṃ catuṣkandhāścaturdvārā āyasaiḥ prākāraiḥ parivāritāḥ |
SA20n1396:229: tatra ca caturdiśaṃ caturbhirdvārai rnirgatyaikaikasmindvāre catvāra utsadā bhavanti |
SA20n1396:235: tatra ca kuṇape gūthamṛttike kīṭāḥ prāṇino ye teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tvacamapi cchidrayanti māṃsamapi snāyvasthyapi bhindanti tato'
SA20n1396:237: tasya khalu kuṇapasya gūthamṛttikasya samanantaraṃ sannihitameva kṣuradhārācitaḥ patho yaṃ te sattvā layanagaveṣiṇo'
SA20n1396:239: tatra teṣāṃ nikṣipte pāde sañchidyate tvaṅmāṃsaśoṇitaṃ |
SA20n1396:241: tasya khalu kṣuradhārācitasya pathaḥ samanantaraṃ sannihitamevāsipatravanaṃ |
SA20n1396:243: tatra teṣāmadhastānniṣaṇṇānāṃ vṛkṣādasayaḥ patanti ye teṣāṃ sattvānāmaṅgapratyaṅgāni cchindrayanti vyatibhindanti |
SA20n1396:244: teṣāṃ tatra patitānāṃ śyāmaśabalā nāmaśvāna āgatya pṛṣṭhīvaṃśānutpāṭyotpāṭya bhakṣayanti ||
SA20n1396:245: tasya khalvasipatravanasya samanantaraṃ sannihitamevāyaḥśālmalīvanaṃ yatte sattvā layanagaveṣiṇo'
SA20n1396:248: avataratāmurdhvībhavanti kaṇṭakā ye teṣāmaṅgapratyaṅgāni cchidrayanti vyatibhindanti |
SA20n1396:249: tatra cāyastuṇḍānāma vāyasā ye teṣāṃ sattvānāmaṃse vā śirasi vābhinipatyabhittvākṣitārakā utpāṭyotpāṭya bhakṣayanti ||
SA20n1396:250: tasya khalvayaḥśālmalīvanasya samanantaraṃ sannihitameva vaitaraṇī nadī pūrṇā kvathitasya kṣārodakasya yatra te sattvā layanagaveṣiṇaḥ prapatanti |
SA20n1396:253: tadyathā nāma mudgā vā māṣā kolā vā kulatthā vodārāgnisampradīptodakāyāṃ sthālyāṃ prakṣiptāḥ |
SA20n1396:254: tasyāḥ khalu nadyā ubhayatastīre daṇḍahastā baḍiśahastā jālahastā sattvā vyavasthitā ye teṣāṃ sattvānāmudgantumapi na prayacchanti vaḍiśoddhārikayā vā jāloddhārikayā vā punaruddhṛtyodārāgnisantaptāyāṃ bhūmāvuttānakānpratiṣṭhāpya pṛcchanti habhmoḥ sattvāḥ kimicchatha |
SA20n1396:256: na jānīmo vayamapi na paśyāmaḥ apitu bubhukṣitāḥ smaḥ |
SA20n1396:257: tataste sattvāsteṣāṃ sattvānāmayomayena viṣkambhanena mukhaṃ viṣkambhayitvāyoguḍānudārāgnisantaptānāsye prakṣipanti pūrvavat |
SA20n1396:261: yāvattannarakavedanīyaṃ pāpakamakuśalaṃ karma sarveṇa sarvaṃ na parikṣīṇaṃ bhavati vyantīkṛtaṃ ||
SA20n1396:262: tatra yaśca kṣuradhārācitaḥ patho yaccāsipatravanaṃ yaccāyaḥśālmalīvanaṃ yā ca vaitaraṇī nadī ayameka utsada iti kṛtvā catvāra utsadā bhavanti ||
SA20n1396:263: tatra śītanarakeṣūpapannāḥ sattvā evaṃrūpaṃ śītaduḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti |
SA20n1396:264: arbudopapannāḥ sattvāstadbhūmikenodāreṇa śītena spṛṣṭā arbudavatsarvāśrayeṇa saṅkocamāpadyante |
SA20n1396:271: tatrāṭaṭo hahavo huhuvo vāgabhilāpakṛtametatteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ nāmavyavasthānaṃ ||
SA20n1396:272: utpale punaḥ śītanarake tadbhūmikenodāreṇa śītena spṛṣṭā vyānīlāyamānāḥ pañcadhā ṣaḍdhā tvacāṃ sphoṭamāpadyante |
SA20n1396:276: nīlatāṃ samatikramya vyālohitāyamānā daśadhā vā bhūyo vā tvacāṃ sphoṭamāpadyante |
SA20n1396:280: bhṛśataraṃ vyālohitāyamānā śatadhā vā bhūyo vā tvacāṃ sphoṭamāpadyante |
SA20n1396:282: pratyekanarakeṣu punarutpannāḥ sattvā evaṃrūpaṃ pratyekaṃ pratyekamātmabhāveṣu svakarmopanipāti duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti |
SA20n1396:291: pretāḥ puna samāsatastrividhā bahirbhojanapānakṛtāvaraṇā adhyātmaṃ bhojanapānakṛtāvaraṇā bhojanapānakṛtāvaraṇāśca ||
SA20n1396:294: te ca bhavanti kṣutpipāsāyogātsaṃśuṣkatvaṅmāṃsaśoṇitā dagdhasthūṇākṛtayaḥ keśānukārairmukhaiḥ kṣutpipāsāparigatavadanāḥ saṃśuṣkamukhā lelihamānajihvāḥ sambhrāntavadanāstena tenānvāhiṇḍantyutsasarastaḍāgeṣu |
SA20n1396:295: tatra cāparairasihastaiḥ pāśahastaistomarahastaiḥ sattvaistebhya utsasarastaḍāgebhyo nivāryante |
SA20n1396:301: tathā hi te svayameva parairakṛtāvaraṇā labdhvāpi bhojanapānaṃ na śaknuvanti bhoktuṃ vā pātuṃ vā |
SA20n1396:304: santi jvālāmālino nāma pretā yeṣāṃ bhuktaṃ bhuktaṃ pītaṃ pītaṃ sarvamavadahyate yenaiṣāṃ kṣutpipāsāduḥkhaṃ na kadācidapaiti ||
SA20n1396:305: santi ca pretā avaskarabhakṣā nāma ya ekatye'
SA20n1396:307: yadvāśuci durgandhamāmagandhaṃ pratikūlaṃ pratikruṣṭaṃ tacchaknuvanti bhakṣayituṃ vā pātuṃ vā |
SA20n1396:309: yattu bhavati śuci vā praṇītaṃ vā tanna śaknuvanti bhoktuṃ vā pātuṃ vā |
SA20n1396:311: tatra manuṣyeṣūpapannāḥ sattvā evaṃrūpaṃ vighātaduḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti |
SA20n1396:318: tathā hi narakeṣu maraṇameva sukhaṃ manyate |
SA20n1396:328: sva āsane devo vā devaputro vā na ramate ||
SA20n1396:329: tasya tasminsamaye pariṣaṇḍe parigatasya tā apsarasastadanyairdevaputraiḥ sārdhaṃ paricaranti |
SA20n1396:330: sa tā dṛṣṭvā tato nidānaṃ mahad duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayate |
SA20n1396:334: tatra yo vistīrṇatareṇa puṇyaskandhena samanvāgato bhavati tasya divyāḥ pañca kāmaguṇā udāratarāḥ prādurbhavanti |
SA20n1396:335: tatra tadanyeṣāṃ nikṛṣṭapuṇyatarāṇāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ dṛṣṭvā madgubhāvaḥ santiṣṭhate |
SA20n1396:339: tathā hi devāsure saṃgrāme pratyupasthite anyonyaṃ devā asurāśca prativiruddhāścaturvidhānyasrāṇyādāya suvarṇamayāni rūpyamayāni sphaṭikamayāni vaidūryamayāni saṃgrāme saṃgrāmayanti |
SA20n1396:340: tatra ca devānāṃ vāsurāṇāṃ vā aṅgapratyaṅgacchedo bhavati |
SA20n1396:344: yadā tu śiraśchinnaṃ bhavati tadā vadhamanuprāpnuvanti |
SA20n1396:345: tata ekadā devāḥ parājīyante ekadā asurāḥ yadbhūyasā tu devā jayanti prabhūtabalatayā |
SA20n1396:346: tayorye parājīyante teṣāṃ sva puraṃ praviṣṭānāṃ nirvṛtiḥ |
SA20n1396:350: asurāścaturvidhāyāḥ sudhāyā arthe devaiḥ sārdhaṃ prativiruddhāḥ |
SA20n1396:353: ato na tathā śukladharmāṇāṃ bhājanabhūtāstadyathā devāḥ |
SA20n1396:355: te surā eva samānā na suradharmamādāya vartante |
SA20n1396:357: balavattaraśca devaputraḥ kupitaḥ samāno durbalataraṃ devaputraṃ svasmādbhavanātpracyāvayati pravāsayati |
SA20n1396:358: tasmāddevāstrividhaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti cyavanapatanaduḥkhaṃ madgubhāvaduḥkhaṃ chedanabhedanavadhapravāsanaduḥkhaṃ ca ||
SA20n1396:360: rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ nāsti sarvaśa eva tadduḥkhaṃ |
SA20n1396:361: duḥkhāyā vedanāyā yasmātte sattvā na bhājanabhūtāḥ |
SA20n1396:369: mahardhikeṣu preteṣu manuṣyeṣu ca bahirmukhanirgatamupakaraṇasukhaṃ duḥkhavyatikīrṇavyatimiśramupalabhyate ||
SA20n1396:373: tadyathā cakraratnaṃ hastiratnamaśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnameva saptamaṃ ||
SA20n1396:374: kathaṃrūpamasya tasminsamaye cakraratnaṃ sambhavatīti yathāsūtrameva saptānāṃ ratnānāṃ prādurbhāvo vaktavyaḥ ||
SA20n1396:380: tena hi yūyaṃ grāmaṇyaḥ svakasvakavijitāni samanuśāsata dharmeṇa mādharmeṇa |
SA20n1396:381: mā ca vo'dharmacāriṇo viṣamacāriṇo rāṣṭre vāso roceta |
SA20n1396:385: devā punarmahatīṃ svargabhūmiṃ pratyanubhavanti varṇavanto ratibahulāḥ sveṣu vimāneṣu cirasthitayaḥ |
SA20n1396:392: nānābhaktivicitritāni kūṭāgāraramaṇīyāni harmya ramaṇīyakāni harmyaramaṇīyakāni vedikāramaṇīyakāni jālavātāyanaramaṇīyakāni nānāmaṇipratyarpitānyāmuktāvabhāsāni samantato bhānti ||
SA20n1396:393: tathā bhojanavṛkṣā yato bhojanaṃ caturvidhā sudhā nirvartate |
SA20n1396:395: evaṃ pānavṛkṣā yato madhumādhavaṃ pānaṃ nirvartate |
SA20n1396:396: yānavṛkṣā yato vicitrāṇi yānāni nirvartante rathayugmaśivikāprabhṛtīni ||
SA20n1396:397: vastravṛkṣā yato vividhāni vastrāṇi sūkṣmāṇi sthūlāni suśuklāni nānāvidharaṅgāṇi suvarṇa bhaktivicitritāni prādurbhavanti |
SA20n1396:398: alaṅkāravṛkṣā yato vividhā alaṅkārā nirvartante maṇayaḥ keyūrāḥ kuṇḍalāni harṣāḥ kaṭakā hastābharaṇāni pādābharaṇāni |
SA20n1396:400: gandhadhūpamālyavṛkṣā yato vicitrā gandhā vividhā dhūpā vividhāni mālyāni |
SA20n1396:408: tasya cādhastāddevāstrayastriṃśāścaturo vārṣikānmāsān divyaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ krīḍanti ||
SA20n1396:409: tathā hāsyanṛtyagītavāditavṛkṣā yato hāsyanṛtya gītavāditānāṃ vicitrāṇi bhājanāni nirvartante ||
SA20n1396:410: tathā bhāṇḍopaskaravṛkṣā yato vicitrā bhāṇḍopaskarā nirvartante |
SA20n1396:411: tadyathā bhojanabhāṇḍopaskaraḥ pānabhāṇḍopaskaraḥ śayanāsanabhāṇḍopaskara ityevambhāgīyo bhāṇḍopaskaraḥ |
SA20n1396:412: teṣāṃ yathepsitaṃ yathākarma tānyupakaraṇānyupabhoktukāmānāṃ haste prādurbhavanti ||
SA20n1396:414: uttareṣu punaḥ kuruṣvevaṃrūpā eva vṛkṣā kalpavṛkṣā ityucyante |
SA20n1396:415: yataste vṛkṣādeva svayaṃ gṛhṇanti no tu cintitaṃ haste santiṣṭate |
SA20n1396:417: amamāśca te sattvā aparigrahā niyataṃ ca viśeṣagāminaḥ ||
SA20n1396:418: tatra ca śakrasya devendrasya sarvaśreṣṭho vaijayantaḥ prāsādo yatraikaviṃśatirniryūha śataṃ |
SA20n1396:423: sarvaśca bhūmibhāgo devānāṃ pāṇitalasamo notkūlanikūlaḥ sparśakṣamaśca |
SA20n1396:431: catvāri ca caturdiśaṃ dvārāṇi māpitānyabhirūpāṇi darśanīyāni prāsādikāni vicitrābhirūpaprabhūtapakṣādhiṣṭhitāni |
SA20n1396:433: tadyathā caitrarathaṃ pāruṣakaṃ miśrakaṃ nandanavanaṃ ca |
SA20n1396:435: bhirūpā darśanīyāḥ prāsādikāḥ uttarapūrveṇa ca devapūryāḥ sudharmā devasabhā yatra devāḥ praviśyārthaṃ cintayanti tulayantyupaparīkṣante |
SA20n1396:436: tasya ca sāmantakena pāṇḍukambalaśilā śvetābhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā |
SA20n1396:442: te rātriṃ divasānyekāntasukhasaumanasyasamarpitā divyaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ ramamāṇā ekāntapramādavaśagā nṛtyaśabdairgītaśabdairvāditaśabdairnaṭanartakahāsakalāsakaśabdaiḥ |
SA20n1396:448: na ca teṣāṃ vyādhirna paribhedo na jaropalabhyate |
SA20n1396:452: rūpāvacarā devāḥ prathamadhyānabhūmikā vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ pratyanubhavanti |
SA20n1396:458: api khalu ṣaḍbhirviśeṣairduḥkhaviśeṣo veditavyaḥ sukhaviśeṣo vā |
SA20n1396:459: parimāṇaviśeṣeṇa saukumāryaviśeṣeṇa pratyayaviśeṣeṇa kālaviśeṣeṇa cittaviśeṣeṇa āśrayaviśeṣeṇa ca |
SA20n1396:460: yathā yathā sukumārataraḥ kāyo bhavati tathā tathā duḥkhaviśeṣo bhavati |
SA20n1396:461: yathā yathā sukumāratara āśrayo bhavati tathā tathā duḥkhaviśeṣo bhavati |
SA20n1396:462: yathā yathā pratyayāstīvratarāḥ pracuratarā vicitratarā bhavanti tathā tathā duḥkhaviśeṣo bhavati |
SA20n1396:463: yathā yathā kālo dīrghataro nirantaraśca bhavati tathā tathā duḥkhaviśeṣo bhavati |
SA20n1396:464: yathā yathā pratisaṃkhyānabalikataraṃ cittaṃ bhavati tathā tathā duḥkhaviśeṣo bhavati |
SA20n1396:465: yathā yathāśrayo duḥkhabhājanabhūtataro bhavati tathā tathā duḥkhaviśeṣo bhavati ||
SA20n1396:472: tadyathā yānaṃ vastramalaṅkāro hāsyanṛtyagītavāditaṃ gandha mālyavilepanaṃ vicitrapraṇītabhāṇḍopaskaratā ālokastrīpuruṣaparicaryā kośasannidhiśca ||
SA20n1396:474: tadyathā ānanda vyāyāmaḥ śilācakravyāyāmo gadācakravyāyāma ityevaṃbhāgīyaṃ ||
SA20n1396:478: tatrārya dhanajaṃ sukhaṃ yatsaptāryāṇi dhanāni pratītyotpadyate śraddhādhanaṃ śīladhanaṃ hrīdhanamapatrāpyadhanaṃ śrutadhanaṃ tyāgadhanaṃ prajñādhanaṃ ||
SA20n1396:493: punaranāryadhanajaṃ parairācchedyaṃ rājabhirvā caurairvā pratyarthibhirvāgninā vodakena vā |
SA20n1396:508: api khalu pañcabhirākārairbāhyātkāmināṃ kāmaparibhogādāryāṇāṃ prajñājīvināṃ dharmaparibhogo viśiṣyate yenāryaḥ prajñājīvyanuttarāṃ prajñājīvikāṃ jīvatītyucyate'
SA20n1396:512: punaraparaṃ kāmināṃ kāmopabhogasya pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate |
SA20n1396:515: na tu tathāryaprajñājīvināṃ dharmopabhogaḥ punaraparaṃ kāmināṃ kāmopabhoge vartamānānāṃ tadeva vastvekatyānāṃ saumanasyasthānīyaṃ bhavati |
SA20n1396:520: punaraparaṃ ito bāhyānāṃ saṃtyaktakāmānāṃ prajñājīvināṃ teṣu teṣu dṛṣṭigateṣu svavikalpasamutthāpiteṣu mithyādhimuktipadeṣu sthāmaśaḥ parāmṛśyābhiniviṣṭacetasāṃ sakāmasaṃkleśo'
SA20n1396:524: punaraparaṃ dharmopabhogināṃ tadvītarāgāṇāṃ ca laukikānāmapi pariniṣpannaṃ kāmasukhaṃ vivekasukhaṃ ca bhavati |
SA20n1396:525: mārapratyarthikānugataṃ ca māyopamaṃ pratiśrutkopamaṃ pratibimbopamaṃ marīcikopamaṃ stapnopamaṃ māyākṛtālaṅkāropamaṃ ca yatsukhaṃ tad bālāḥ kāmopabhogino laukikavītarāgāśconmattakopamāḥ pratiniṣevante |
SA20n1396:529: api khalu kathaṃ traidhātukāvacarāṇāṃ sattvānāmāśrayo draṣṭavyaḥ |
SA20n1396:538: ata eva bhagavatā sukhā vedanāpi pariṇāmaduḥkhatayā duḥkhetyuktā |
SA20n1396:544: yatpunarbhagavatā saṃjñāvedayitanirodhasukhaṃ sukhānāmagratvena vyavasthāpitaṃ tadvihārasukhamabhisandhāya no tu vedayitasukhaṃ ||
SA20n1396:545: yadapyuktaṃ trīṇi sukhāni rāgavirāgo dveṣavirāgo mohavirāga iti |
SA20n1396:550: tadyathā jātānāṃ bhūtānāṃ traidhātukāvacarāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ caturbhirāhārairyāvadāyuḥsthitirbhavati |
SA20n1396:551: yāvatā tatra tribhirāhāraiḥ sparśena manaḥsañcetanayā na sarveṣāṃ traidhātukāvacarāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ sthitirbhavati |
SA20n1396:553: yāvatā tatra narakopapannānāṃ sattvānāṃ sūkṣmaḥ kāvaḍīkārāhāragarbho vāyurvāti |
SA20n1396:555: yāvatā tiraścāṃ pretānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ caudārika āhāro yaṃ te kavaḍīkṛtya bhakṣayanti |
SA20n1396:556: ya eva punaḥ sūkṣmakalalādigatānāṃ sattvānāṃ devānāṃ ca kāmāvacarāṇāṃ |
SA20n1396:558: teṣāṃ bhuktamātra eva kavaḍīkāra āhāraḥ kāye sarvāṅgeṣvanuvisarañjarāmāpadyate |
SA20n1396:561: tatrāyaṃ maithunaparibhogo nārakāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ nāsti |
SA20n1396:562: tathā hi te tīvraṃ ca duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti vicitrañca dīrghaṃ ca nirantaraṃ ca |
SA20n1396:563: tataśca teṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ strīṣu strīcchanda eva notpadyate |
SA20n1396:564: strīṇāṃ ca puruṣe puruṣacchanda eva notpadyate |
SA20n1396:567: te cānyo'nyaṃ striyaśca puruṣāśca dvayadvayaṃ samāpadyante |
SA20n1396:572: yathā cāturmahārājakāyikānāmevaṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ yāmānāmanyonyaṃ pariṣvajanamātrakeṇa dāho vigacchati |
SA20n1396:575: paranirmitavaśavartināmanyonyaṃ cakṣuṣā cakṣurupanidhyāya nirīkṣitamātrakeṇa dāho vigacchati |
SA20n1396:580: uttareṣu kuruṣvamamatvādaparigrahatvātteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ nāsti dāraparigraho nāvāhavivāhaḥ |
SA20n1396:581: yathā triṣu dvīpeṣvevaṃ pretanarakeṣu kāmāvacareṣu ca deveṣu |
SA20n1396:582: sthāpayitvā nirmāṇaratīnparanirmitavaśavartinaśca devān kāmāvacareṣu devanikāyeṣu nāpsarasāṃ garbhaḥ santiṣṭhate |
SA20n1396:583: cāturmahārājakāyikānāmaṃsevotsaṅge vā mātāpitroḥ pañcavarṣako vā dāraka aupapādukaḥ sambhavati trāyastriṃśakānāṃ ṣaḍvarṣako vā yāmānāṃ saptavarṣako vā tuṣitānāmaṣṭavarṣako vā nirmāṇaratīnāṃ navavarṣako vā paranirmitavaśavartināṃ daśavarṣako vā dārako'
SA20n1396:588: santi sattvāḥ pratyupasthitakāmā ye pratyupasthitaiḥ kāmairaiśvaryaṃ vaśe vartayanti |
SA20n1396:593: santi sattvā nirmitakāmā ye nirmāya nirmāya kāmākāmānaiśvaryaṃ vaśe vartayanti |
SA20n1396:596: teṣāṃ ca nirmāṇaratīnāṃ devānāmātmanimittaṃ kāmanirmāṇaṃ samṛdhyati |
SA20n1396:600: santi sattvā paranirmitakāmā ye paranirmitairapi kāmairaiśvaryaṃ vaśe vartayanti |
SA20n1396:602: tathā hi teṣāṃ devānāmātmanimittamapi nirmāṇaṃ samṛdhyati paranimittamapi |
SA20n1396:606: na tu te paranirmitāneva kāmānniṣevanti api tu svanirmitānapi |
SA20n1396:610: santi sattvā ye vivekajena prītisukhena kāmamabhiṣvandayanti |
SA20n1396:613: santi sattvā ye samādhijena prītisukhena kāmamabhiṣyandayanti |
SA20n1396:614: tadyathā devā dvitīyadhyānabhūmikāḥ iyaṃ dvitīyā sukhopapattiḥ ||
SA20n1396:615: santi sattvā ye niṣprītikena sukhena kāmamabhiṣyandayanti tadyathā devāstṛtīyadhyānabhūmikāḥ |
SA20n1396:620: āha | tisra imā eṣaṇāḥ kāmaiṣaṇā bhavaiṣaṇā brahmacaryeṣaṇā ca |
SA20n1396:621: tatra ye kecicchramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā kāmaiṣaṇāmāpadyante sarve te tisṛṇāṃ kāmopapattīnāmarthe |
SA20n1396:623: tatra ye kecicchramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā bhavaiṣaṇāmāpadyante sukhanimittaṃ sarve te yadbhūyasā sukhakāmatayā tisṛṇāṃ sukhopapattīnāmarthe |
SA20n1396:627: ye kecicchramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā brahmacaryeṣaṇāmāpadyante sarve te'
SA20n1396:629: apyeke mithyābrahmacaryaiṣaṇāmāpadyanta āniñjasyārtha ākāśānantyāyatanasya vijñānānantyāyatanasyākiñcanyāyatanasya naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasyārthe mithyāvimokṣataḥ parikalpitasya |
SA20n1396:641: teṣāṃ tathā viharatāṃ smṛtiḥ pramuṣyate smṛtipramoṣātteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmātsthānāccyutirbhavati |
SA20n1396:642: tathā santi manaḥpradūṣikā nāma devā ye tasminsamaye'
SA20n1396:644: teṣāṃ tathā prekṣamāṇānāmanyonyaṃ manāṃsipraduṣyanti manaḥpradoṣātteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmātsthānāccyutirbhavati ||
SA20n1396:646: tadyathā kalalagateṣu ghanagateṣu peśīgateṣvarbudagateṣu mātuḥ kukṣigateṣu sattveṣu ||
SA20n1396:649: astyātmabhāvapratilambho yatra naivātmasañcetanā krāmati na parasañcetanā |
SA20n1396:650: tadyathā rūpyārūppāvacareṣu deveṣu nārakeṣu narakopameṣu preteṣu tathāgatadūte caramabhavike maitrīsamāpanne nirodhasamāpanne'
SA20n1396:656: yatpūrvaṃ yacca pratiṣṭhāya yacca saṅgamya yasya dharmasya prāptirvā siddhirvā niṣpattirvā kriyā vā sa tasya heturityucyate |
SA20n1396:657: kiṃpūrvā ki pratiṣṭhāya kiṃ saṅgamya kasya dharmasyotpattirbhavati |
SA20n1396:658: svabījapūrvā bījāśrayaṃ sthāpayitvā tadanyamāśrayaṃ pratirūpiṇamarūpiṇaṃ vā karma ca pratiṣṭhāya sahāyamālambanaṃ ca saṅgamya kāmapratisaṃyuktānāṃ rūpapratisaṃyuktānāmārūpyapratisaṃyuktānāmapratisaṃyuktānāmutpāditā bhavati |
SA20n1396:660: kiṃpūrvā kiṃ pratiṣṭhāya kiṃ saṅgamya kasya dharmasya prāptirbhavati |
SA20n1396:661: śrāvakapratyekabuddhatathāgatagotrapūrvādhyātmāṅgabalaṃ pratiṣṭhāya bāhyāṅgabalaṃ saṅgamya kleśavisaṃyogasya nirvāṇasya prāptirbhavati ||
SA20n1396:677: tatra kiṃpūrvā kiṃ pratiṣṭhāya kiṃ saṅgamya kasya dharmasya siddhirbhavati |
SA20n1396:678: jñeyādhimuktirucipūrvā pratijñāhetūdāharaṇaṃ pratiṣṭhāya prativādinamavilomāṃ ca pariṣadaṃ saṅgamya sādhyasyārthasya siddhirbhavati ||
SA20n1396:679: kiṃpūrvā kiṃ pratiṣṭhāya kiṃ saṅgamya kasya dharmasya niṣpattirbhavati |
SA20n1396:680: śilpajñānapūrvā tadanugaṃ vyavasāyaṃ pratiṣṭhāya śilpakarmasthānīyaṃ bhāṇḍopaskaraṃ tasya tasya śilpakarmasthānasya siddhirbhavati ||
SA20n1396:681: kiṃpūrvā kiṃ pratiṣṭhāya kiṃ saṅgamya kasya dharmasya sthitirbhavati tṛṣṇāpūrvā punahārasthitikarmāśrayaṃ pratiṣṭhāya catura āhārānsaṅgamya bhūtānāṃ sattvānāṃ sthitirbhavati |
SA20n1396:683: kiṃpūrvā kiṃ pratiṣṭhāya kiṃ saṅgamya kasya dharmasya kriyā bhavati |
SA20n1396:684: svabījapūrvotpattiṃ pratiṣṭhāyotpattipratyayaṃ saṅgamya sakarmakasya dharmasya svakriyā prajñāyate svakarmakaraṇaṃ tadyathā cakṣuṣo darśanaṃ |
SA20n1396:689: vāyuḥ śoṣayatītyevaṃbhāgīyaṃ bāhyānāmapi bhāvānāṃ svakasvakaṃ karma veditavyaṃ ||
SA20n1396:738: kāmapratisaṃyukteṣu dharmeṣu rūpapratisaṃyukteṣvārūpyapratisaṃyukteṣu apratisaṃyukteṣu nāmavyavasthānapūrvā saṃjñā pravartate |
SA20n1396:745: yaḥ kāmapratisaṃyuktena sukhenārthī bhavati sa tadapekṣya kāmānāṃ lābhaṃ paryeṣate saṃnicayaṃ vā pratiniṣevaṇaṃ vā paryeṣate ||
SA20n1396:746: yo rūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktena sukhenārthī bhavati sa tadapekṣya tatpratyayānāṃ lābhaṃ vā pratiniṣevaṇaṃ vā paryeṣate |
SA20n1396:747: yo vā pratisaṃyuktena sukhenārthī bhavati sa tadapekṣya tatpratyayānāṃ lābhaṃ vā pratiṣevaṇaṃ vā paryeṣate |
SA20n1396:748: yo vā punarduḥkhenānarthī sa tadapekṣya tatpratyayānāṃ parihāraṃ tatprahāṇapratyayānāṃ lābhaṃ vā pratiniṣevaṇaṃ vā paryeṣate |
SA20n1396:765: tatra śliṣṭanirodhaṃ hetvadhiṣṭhānamadhiṣṭhāya tathā viṣayamindriyaṃ kriyāṃ puruṣakāraṃ tattvadarśanaṃ ca hetvadhiṣṭhānamadhiṣṭhāya parigrahahetuḥ prajñāpyate |
SA20n1396:770: yathā kāmapratisaṃyuktānāmevaṃ rūpapratisaṃyuktānāmārūpyapratisaṃyuktānāṃ tattvadarśanaparigṛhītā vā punastadanyeṣāmapratisaṃyuktānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pravṛttirbhavati |
SA20n1396:771: tasmācchiṣṭanirodhaṃ viṣayamindriyaṃ kriyāṃ puruṣakāraṃ tattvadarśanaṃ cādhiṣṭhāya parigrahahetuḥ prajñāpyate ||
SA20n1396:777: tadanukūlatayā yathā kāmapratisaṃyuktā evaṃ rūpapratisaṃyuktā rūpapratisaṃyuktānkuśalāndharmān vaiśeṣikānārūpyapratisaṃyuktānapratisaṃyuktān |
SA20n1396:782: tadyathā kāmarāgo dveṣaṃ mohaṃ mānaṃ dṛṣṭiṃ vicikitsāṃ kāyaduścaritaṃ vāgduścaritaṃ manoduścaritaṃ |
SA20n1396:783: yathā kāmarāgau evaṃ dveṣo moho māno dṛṣṭirvicikitsā yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ |
SA20n1396:787: tadyathā kavaḍīkāra āhāro bhūtānāṃ sattvānāṃ sthitaye yāpanāyā ojaso balasya puṣṭeścāvāhakastadanukūlatayā |
SA20n1396:793: yathā kāmapratisaṃyuktā evaṃ rūpapratisaṃyuktā ārūpyapratisaṃyuktā apratisaṃyuktāḥ |
SA20n1396:805: kāmapratisaṃyuktānāṃ dharmāṇā mutpattaye sa cedantarāyaḥ pratyupasthito bhavati notpadyante |
SA20n1396:807: yathotpattaya evaṃ prāptaye siddhaye niṣpattaye kriyāyai |
SA20n1396:812: kāmapratisaṃyuktānāṃ dharmāṇāmutpattaye sa cedantarāyaḥ pratyupasthito bhavati bhavatyeṣāmutpādaḥ |
SA20n1396:820: tatra vāsanāmānukūlyaṃ ca hetvadhiṣṭhānaṃ pratyayādhiṣṭhānaṃ cādhiṣṭhāya vipākaphalaṃ niṣyandaphalaṃ ca prajñāpyate |
SA20n1396:821: tattvadarśanaṃ hetvadhiṣṭhānaṃ pratyayādhiṣṭhānaṃ cādhiṣṭhāya visaṃyogaphalaṃ prajñāpyate |
SA20n1396:822: puruṣakāraṃ hetvadhiṣṭhānaṃ pratyayādhiṣṭhānaṃ cādhiṣṭhāya puruṣakāraphalaṃ prajñāpyate |
SA20n1396:861: nityasya heturbhavanparabhāvasya heturbhavati uttarasya ca svabhāvasya |
SA20n1396:862: no tu tatkṣaṇikasya parasyottarasya ca svabhāvasya heturbhavati |
SA20n1396:866: pratyayāntaramapi labdhvā bhavan vikāramāpadyamāno bhavati na vikāramanāpannaḥ |
SA20n1396:869: śaktiyuktādapi bhavannanurūpānukūlādbhavati nānanurūpānanukūlādityebhiḥ saptabhirākārairhetunā yathāyogaṃ vyavasthānaṃ veditavyaṃ ||
SA20n1396:901: lokottarajñānamapekṣya tadanye sarve traidhātukāvacarāścittacaitasikā dharmā vikalpena na vitarkavicāraḥ ||
SA20n1396:903: nārakāṇāṃ vitarkavicārāḥ kimākārāḥ pravartante kiṃsparśāḥ kiṃsamudīritāḥ kiṃsamprayuktāḥ kiṃprārthanāḥ kiṃkarmakāḥ |
SA20n1396:904: yathā nārakāṇāmevaṃ tiraścāṃ pretānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devānāṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikānāṃ devānāṃ vitarkavicārāḥ kimākārāḥ kiṃsparśāḥ kiṃsamudīritāḥ kiṃsamprayuktāḥ kiṃprārthanāḥ kiṃkarmakāśca pravartante |
SA20n1396:905: tatra nārakāṇāṃ vitarkavicārā ekāntena dainyākārā aniṣṭaviṣayasaṃsparśā duḥkhasamudīritā daurmanasyasamprayuktā duḥkhavimokṣaprārthanāścittasaṃkṣobhakarmakāśca pravartante ||
SA20n1396:906: yathā nārakāṇāmevaṃ duḥkhitānāṃ pretānāṃ tiraścāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ pretasahagatikānāṃ vitarkavicārā bāhulyena dainyākārā alpamodākārāḥ |
SA20n1396:911: devānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ vitarkavicārā bāhulyenāmodākārā alpaṃ dainyākārāḥ |
SA20n1396:933: adhiṣṭhānaṃ ca vastu ca eṣaṇā paribhogatā |
SA20n1396:934: pratipattiśca bodhī dve tathā pāramitena ca ||
SA20n1396:957: yathāpi sa eva tathā bhogānparyeṣyāraktaḥ paribhuṅkte'
SA20n1396:965: yathāpīhaikatyo mātṛjñaḥ pitṛjñaḥ śrāmaṇyo bāhmaṇyaḥ kulajyeṣṭhāpacāyako'
SA20n1396:1030: eṣa khalu caturṣvanuvṛttyupagameṣu catvāri sthānāni niścitya pañcavidhaṃ phalaṃ veditavyaṃ |
SA20n1396:1076: yathāpīhaikatyaḥ śramaṇo brāhmaṇo vā evaṃdṛṣṭirbhavatyevaṃvādī nityaṃ nityakālaṃ dhruvaṃ dhruvakālaṃ vidyata eva hetau phalamiti tadyathā vārṣagaṇyaḥ ||
SA20n1396:1077: te punaḥ kena kāraṇena hetau phalaṃ paśyanti vyavasthāpayanti paridīpayanti |
SA20n1396:1082: yathā sa eva śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā tārkiko bhavati mīmāṃsakastarkaparyāpannāyāṃ bhūmau sthitaḥ svayaṃ prātibhānikyāṃ pārthagjanikyāṃ mīmāṃsānucaritāyāṃ |
SA20n1396:1084: yebhyo bhāvebhyo ye bhāvā utpadyante te teṣāṃ kāraṇatvena prasiddhāḥ prajñāpyante ca |
SA20n1396:1086: tasya ca phalasyārthe phalārthibhirapyādīyante na tadanye |
SA20n1396:1087: ta eva ca teṣu teṣu kṛtyeṣu viniyujyante na tadanye |
SA20n1396:1090: anyathā hi sarvaṃ sarvasya kāraṇatvena vyavasthāpyeta |
SA20n1396:1094: prajñaptitaścopādānataśca kṛtyaviniyogataścotpattitaśca nityakālaṃ hetau phalaṃ paśyanti ||
SA20n1396:1095: sa idaṃ syādvacanīyaḥ kaccidicchasi hetulakṣaṇaṃ phalalakṣaṇaṃ hetorvā punaḥ phalalakṣaṇamabhinnalakṣaṇaṃ vā bhinnalakṣaṇaṃ vā |
SA20n1396:1098: phalaniyama iti nirviśiṣṭatvāddhetuphalayorhetau phalaṃ vidyata iti na yujyate |
SA20n1396:1104: tena hetau phalamutpadyata iti na yujyate |
SA20n1396:1107: tatra vidyamānalakṣaṇo dharmo vidyamānalakṣaṇe dharme pañcākāreṇa lakṣaṇena veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1396:1117: tasmādapi nityakālaṃ dhruvakālaṃ vidyata eva hetau phalamiti na yujyate |
SA20n1396:1125: yathāpīhaikatyaḥ śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evaṃdṛṣṭirbhavatyevaṃvādī |
SA20n1396:1127: tadyathā sa eva hetuphalasadvādī śabdalakṣaṇavādī ca ||
SA20n1396:1128: kena kāraṇena hetuphalasadvādī hetau vidyamānasya phalasyābhivyakti paśyati |
SA20n1396:1132: yathāpīhaikatyaḥ svayameva tārkiko bhavati mīmāṃsaka iti |
SA20n1396:1136: na ca na kriyate prayatnaḥ phalaniṣpattaye |
SA20n1396:1154: sacedvidyamānatāvaraṇakāraṇaṃ tena na nityakālamabhivyaktirvidyamānasyeti na yujyate heturapi vidyate |
SA20n1396:1156: tena sa eva heturbhavatyekasya sa eva phalaṃ |
SA20n1396:1158: tena sa evābhivyaktaḥ sa evānabhivyakta iti na yujyate ||
SA20n1396:1164: sacedanyāṃ tena sā sahetukā nirhetukā vā |
SA20n1396:1176: tasmādyo bhāvo nāsti sa nāstyeva tallakṣaṇaḥ |
SA20n1396:1194: yenāsyaivaṃ bhavati nityaḥ śabda iti tasmādabhivyaktivādo'
SA20n1396:1198: yathāpīhaikatyaḥ śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā iha dhārmiko vā punarayoniśa evaṃdṛṣṭirbhavatyevaṃvādī |
SA20n1396:1209: iha dhārmiko vā punaḥ sūtrāntānayoniśaḥ kalpayati |
SA20n1396:1218: yo dharmo yena lakṣaṇena vyavasthitaḥ sa tena pariniṣpannaḥ |
SA20n1396:1220: sacedatīto na syāttena tadā vihīnasvalakṣaṇaḥ syāt |
SA20n1396:1234: tena triṣvadhvasu tathaiva vidyata iti na yujyate ||
SA20n1396:1255: tenābhūtvā bhāva ekata eva yathoktā doṣā iti na yujyate |
SA20n1396:1256: tacca karma kaccidicchasi tasmādbhinnalakṣaṇaṃ abhinnalakṣaṇaṃ vā |
SA20n1396:1260: tenākarmako bhūtvā sakarmako bhavatīti na yujyate ||
SA20n1396:1263: tatrāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ svabhāvasaṅkaradoṣa iti na yujyate |
SA20n1396:1264: yathā'nāgataṃ vartamānaṃ ca evaṃ vartamānamatītaṃ ca yathāyogaṃ doṣayuktaṃ draṣṭavyamebhireva kāraṇairanenaivottaramārgeṇeti svalakṣaṇato'pi |
SA20n1396:1284: tena yā nairātmyagrāhikā śaśaviṣāṇavandhyāputrādigrāhikā buddhirnaivāstīti na yujyate |
SA20n1396:1285: yadapyuktaṃ sarvamasti yāvadeva dvādaśāyatanānīti tadapi sati sallakṣaṇāstitāṃ sandhāyoktaṃ |
SA20n1396:1287: tathāhi sallakṣaṇā api dharmāḥ sallakṣaṇaṃ dhārayanti |
SA20n1396:1290: anyathā tu sato jñānādasataścājñānādyogino na nirantarajñeyadharmaparīkṣā syāditi na yujyate ||
SA20n1396:1291: yadapyuktamastyatītaṃ karma yataḥ sattvāḥ savyābaddhā vyābādhāṃ vedayantīti |
SA20n1396:1293: yeṣu saṃskāreṣu yacchubhāśubhaṃ karmotpannaniruddhaṃ bhavati tena hetunā tena pratyayena viśiṣṭā saṃskārasantatiḥ pravartate sā vāsanetyucyate |
SA20n1396:1294: yasyāḥ prabandhapatitāyā iṣṭāniṣṭaphalaṃ nirvartate iti na yujyate |
SA20n1396:1296: yadapyuktamasti rūpamatītamastyanāgatamasti pratyutpannaṃ evaṃ yāvad vijñānamiti |
SA20n1396:1343: ito bāhyastīrthyaḥ satyataḥ sthitita ātmā vā sattvo vā jīvo vā poṣo vā pudgalo vetyādi |
SA20n1396:1352: sacedātmā na syāt pañcabhirākāraiḥ pañcavidhavastudarśane satyātmabuddhirna pravarteta |
SA20n1396:1354: sukhaduḥkhāvadīrṇaṃ saṃskāraṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃjñābuddhireva pravarteta na sattvapatitocchritabuddhiḥ |
SA20n1396:1357: nāminaṃ nāmasambaddhaṃ saṃskāraṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃjñābuddhireva pravarteta |
SA20n1396:1358: na kṣatriyo vā brāhmaṇo vā vaiśyo vā śudro vā brahmadatto vā guṇamitro veti sattvabuddhiḥ |
SA20n1396:1363: yataścaivamabuddhipūrvameṣu pañcasu vastuṣu pañcākārā sattvabuddhireva pravartate na saṃskārabuddhiḥ |
SA20n1396:1364: tasmādabuddhipūrvaṃ tāvadasya dṛṣṭvā sattvabuddhipratyupalabdhita evaṃ bhavatyastyātmeti ||
SA20n1396:1366: sacedātmā na syānna saṃskāreṣu buddhipūrvā ceṣṭopalabhyeta |
SA20n1396:1367: ahaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyāmi paśyāmi dṛṣṭavān |
SA20n1396:1378: tena rūpādiṣu sattva iti viparyāsānna yujyate'styātmeti |
SA20n1396:1382: kṣatriyādibālapaṇḍito rūpādiṣu viṣayagrāhaka ātmeti na yujyate ||
SA20n1396:1385: tena yadeva paśyati tatraiva viparyastā buddhirityātmabuddhirna yujyate |
SA20n1396:1386: sacedanyasmādapi tena sarvaviṣayāḥ sarvaviṣayabuddheḥ kāraṇībhavantīti na yujyate ||
SA20n1396:1394: kaccidicchasi yāsau sattvabuddhiḥ sā pratyakṣārthagrāhikānumānārthagrāhikā veti |
SA20n1396:1396: tena rūpādayaḥ skandhā eva na sattvaḥ pratyakṣa iti na yujyate |
SA20n1396:1397: sacedānumānikārthagrāhikā tena bāladārakāṇāmapyanabhyūhya sahasā pravartate iti na yujyate ||
SA20n1396:1406: savikāra ātmā ceṣṭata iti na yujyate |
SA20n1396:1412: tadā sadāceṣṭaḥ punaśceṣṭata iti na yujyate ||
SA20n1396:1415: kaccidicchasi sahetukaṃ sattvaśceṣṭate nirhetukaṃ ceṣṭate veti |
SA20n1396:1419: sadā sarvakālaṃ sarvaṃ ceṣṭata iti na yujyate |
SA20n1396:1422: ātmano vyādhiṃ jarāṃ maraṇaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃkleśaṃ prati ceṣṭata iti na yujyate ||
SA20n1396:1426: kaccitskandhamātre sattvaprajñaptimicchasi skandheṣu vānyatra vā skandhebhyaḥ |
SA20n1396:1434: anugrahopaghāte vā punaḥ sati dharmādharmayoḥ pravṛttirna yujyate |
SA20n1396:1436: aprayatne ca sadā mukta ātmeti na yujyate ||
SA20n1396:1438: pṛthaksaṃskārebhyo bhaṅgotpattiprabandhapravṛttito nopalabhyate iti na yujyate ||
SA20n1396:1439: iha ca vinaṣṭasyānyatrākṛtābhyāgamadoṣa iti na yujyate |
SA20n1396:1446: tena kiṃ darśanādiṣu draṣṭṭatvādyupacāraṃ kṛtvā draṣṭṭatvalakṣaṇa āhosvitpṛthaktebhyaḥ |
SA20n1396:1447: saceddarśanādiṣu upacāre tena darśanādīnyeva draṣṭṭaṇītyātmā draṣṭeti na yujyate |
SA20n1396:1450: tena taddarśanādikamātmanaḥ karma vā syātkaraṇaṃ vā |
SA20n1396:1456: sa kāmakārīṃ ca savārtheṣviti na yujyate |
SA20n1396:1469: tena yathā dātrādanyā chedanādikriyā evaṃ darśanādanyaddarśanādyantaraṃ nopalabhyata iti na yujyate |
SA20n1396:1476: kaccidicchasi yatsaṃkleśavyavadānalakṣaṇayuktaṃ tatsaṃkliśyate vā vyavadāyate vā |
SA20n1396:1479: tena yeṣu saṃskārepvītaya upadravā upasargāstadbyupaśamānugrahā vopalabhyante te saṃskārāḥ saṃkleśavyavadānalakṣaṇayuktāḥ |
SA20n1396:1480: ato'satyātmani te saṃkliśyante vyavadāyante ceti na yujyate |
SA20n1396:1483: tena saṃkleśavyavadānalakṣaṇavirahitaḥ saṃkliśyate vyavadāyate vātmeti na yujyate ||
SA20n1396:1485: kaccidicchasi yatpravartakalakṣaṇayuktaṃ tatpravartate ca nivartate ca |
SA20n1396:1493: tenāntareṇātmānaṃ saṃskārā eva pravartante nivartante ceti na yujyate |
SA20n1396:1495: tena pravartaka lakṣaṇahīna ātmā pravartate nivartate ceti na yujyate ||
SA20n1396:1500: sa bhoktā vā kartā vā moktā veti |
SA20n1396:1503: tena saṃskārā eva bhoktāraḥ kartāro moktāra ityanitya ātmā iti na yujyate |
SA20n1396:1505: tena moktā kartā moktātmeti nirvikāro na yujyate ||
SA20n1396:1512: tena darśanādiṣvindriyeṣu kartrupacāra iti vyarthātmakalpaneti na yujyate ||
SA20n1396:1516: tena saṃvyavahāraḥ puruṣadehe guṇamitro buddhadatta ityevamādiḥ na yujyate |
SA20n1396:1518: tena saṃskāramātra ātmopacāra iti vyarthātmakalpaneti na yujyate |
SA20n1396:1519: tathāhi saṃvyavahāraḥ puruṣa evātra sattva iti saṃjñāyate |
SA20n1396:1528: tena tathā sati aviparyaṃsteti na yujyate |
SA20n1396:1529: sati ca tadviparyāse asyātmeti na yujyate |
SA20n1396:1532: tena satyataḥ sthititaḥ satyātmani nairātmyadṛṣṭiḥ kuśalāviparīteti na yujyate ||
SA20n1396:1534: tena sarvajñadeśitā prayogajanitā mokṣānuttrāsakarī śuklaphalā doṣāṇāṃ pratipakṣabhūteti na yujyate ||
SA20n1396:1537: tena na kadācinnāstyātmeti buddhiḥ syāditi na yujyate ||
SA20n1396:1539: tenāsatyapyātmani saṃskāramātra ātmadarśanavaśādastyātmeti manyata iti na yujyate |
SA20n1396:1541: evaṃ lakṣaṇavyavasthayā saṃkleśavyavadānavyavasthayā pravṛttinivṛttivyavasthayā bhoktṛkartṛmoktṛdraṣṭṛprajñaptyāpi ātmāstīti na yujyate ||
SA20n1396:1558: api caturbhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ saṃskāreṣu sattvaprajñaptirveditavyā sukhasaṃvyavahārārthaṃ |
SA20n1396:1565: yathāpīhaikatyaḥ śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo veti pūrvavat |
SA20n1396:1572: śāśvatavādinaḥ ekatyaśāśvatikāśca pūrvāntakalpakā aparāntakalpakā vā saṃjñivādino'
SA20n1396:1578: tatra pūrvāntakalpakānāṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātradhyānasaṃniśrayeṇa atītādhvikaṃ pūrvāntaṃ kalpayatāṃ pūrvanivāsānusmṛtyā pratītyasamutpādakuśalānāṃ atītasaṃskāreṣu smṛtimātraṃ yathābhūtaṃ saṃprajānatāṃ taddṛṣṭigatamutpadyate |
SA20n1396:1579: divyacakṣussaṃniśrayaṃ vā punarvartamānādhvikaṃ pūrvāntaṃ kalpayatāṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgānupravṛttiṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ
SA20n1396:1581: brahmaṇo vā punaḥ svamanorathasiddhimupalabhataḥ mahābhūtavipariṇāmaṃ vijñānavipariṇāmaṃ copalabhamānasya ||
SA20n1396:1582: aparānte vā punaḥ saṃjñāṃ vedanābhedaṃ ca paśyato na svalakṣaṇabhedaṃ taddṛṣṭigatamutpadyate |
SA20n1396:1586: apacayapūrvakaṃ ca vināśaṃ kalpayato yenaivaṃ bhavati |
SA20n1396:1591: tatra pūrvāntakalpakānāmaparāntakalpakānāṃ ca viśeṣalakṣaṇasaṃgṛhītatvācchāśvatavādasyātmavāde vidūṣita ātmano viśeṣalakṣaṇavādo'
SA20n1396:1599: bhavan sattvā yatrāhamabhūvamevaṃnāmaivaṃjātya iti vistareṇa kathanaṃ na yujyate ||
SA20n1396:1600: kaccidicchasi rūpāvalambane cakṣurvijñāne saṃmukhībhūte rūpa eva viṣaye samavahite tadanyeṣu viṣayeṣu vyavahiteṣu tadanyeṣāṃ vijñānānāṃ nirodho vā pravṛttirveti |
SA20n1396:1604: tenaikena viṣayeṇa sarvakālaṃ sarvavijñānapravṛttiriti na yujyate |
SA20n1396:1605: kaccidicchasi astyātmanaḥ saṃjñākṛto vā vedanākṛto vā vikāro na veti |
SA20n1396:1606: tena śāśvata ātmā ca lokaśceti na yujyate |
SA20n1396:1608: tenaikatvasaṃjñī bhūtvā nānātvasaṃjñī parīttasaṃjñī apramāṇasaṃjñī bhavatīti na yujyate ||
SA20n1396:1609: ekāntasukhī ekāntaduḥkhī sukhaduḥkhī aduḥkhāsukhī bhavatīti na yujyate ||
SA20n1396:1611: tatra yaḥ kaścitsajīvastaccharīramiti paśyati sa rūpiṇamātmānaṃ paśyati |

SA20n1396:1616: sacetpunaḥ rūpiṇaṃ vārūpiṇaṃ vā parīttaṃ paśyati so'

SA20n1396:1626: kaccidicchasi aparīkṣitaṃ vā paramāṇunityatvaṃ parīkṣitaṃ vā |
SA20n1396:1628: tena parīkṣāmantareṇa nityatvaniścaya iti na yujyate ||
SA20n1396:1633: tena yadapacitaṃ tad durbalataramiti nityamiti na yujyate ||

SA20n1396:1644: tena sadā sarvakāryotpattirna ca hetuniyamo na ca phalaniyama iti na yujyate ||
SA20n1396:1646: tena kaccidicchasi tasmādanatiricyamānavigrahamūrtti vā atiricyamānavigrahamūrtti veti |
SA20n1396:1651: sati sthūlamapi dravyaṃ nityamiti na yujyate |
SA20n1396:1652: apūrvaparamāṇuprādurbhāve punaḥ paramāṇurnitya iti na yujyate ||
SA20n1396:1659: tena dṛṣṭānto nopalabhyata iti na yujyate ||
SA20n1396:1663: sūkṣmaṃ dravyaṃ tadāśrayaṃ na sattvanaimittikamiti na yujyate |
SA20n1396:1665: sacenna sattvanaimittikī tena niṣprayojano bāhyānāṃ bhāvānāṃ prādurbhāvo na yujyate ||
SA20n1396:1669: pi pūrvāntakalpakānāmaparāntakalpakānāṃ ca śāśvatavādo na yujyate ||

SA20n1396:1695: karmakṣayāddaḥkhakṣaya iti pūrvakṛtahetukasya ca dṛṣṭadharmaupakramikasya cetyabhiprāyaḥ |
SA20n1396:1711: kaccidicchasi yattaddṛṣṭadharmaupakramikaṃ duḥkhaṃ tatpūrvakṛtahetukaṃ vā dṛṣṭadharmopakramahetukaṃ veti |
SA20n1396:1713: tena paurāṇānāṃ karmaṇāṃ tapasā vyantībhāvātpratyutpannānāṃ vā
SA20n1396:1716: yatkiñcidayaṃ puruṣapudgalaḥ pratisaṃvedayate sarvaṃ tatpūrvakṛtahetukamiti na yujyate ityaupakramikasya duḥkhasya pūrvakṛtahetukatāpi puruṣakārahetukatāpi na yujyate |
SA20n1396:1720: yathāpīhaikatyaḥ svakarmādhipatyenāpāyeṣu votpadyate nīceṣu vā kṛcchreṣu vā kuleṣu |
SA20n1396:1730: saddharmaṃ śṛṇvato dharmānabhimukhamabhisambudhyataḥ īryāpathaṃ kalpayataḥ śilpakarmasthānāni śikṣataḥ |
SA20n1396:1734: yathāpīhaikatyaḥ śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo veti vistareṇa pūrvavat |
SA20n1396:1735: yatkiñcidayaṃ puruṣapudgalaḥ pratisaṃvedayate sarva tadīśvaranirmāṇahetukaṃ vā puruṣāntaranirmāṇahetukaṃ vetyevamādi |
SA20n1396:1744: sattvā hetukāle ca śubhe pravartsyāma ityakāmakāḥ pāpe'

SA20n1396:1748: yenaiṣāmevaṃ bhavati asti sa kaścitkartā sraṣṭā nirmātā pitṛbhūto bhāvānāmīśvarastadanyo veti ||
SA20n1396:1753: yattadīśvarasya nirmāṇasāmarthyaṃ tatkaccidicchasi karmayogahetukaṃ vāhetukaṃ veti |
SA20n1396:1767: tena nāsti ca prayojanaṃ sṛjatīti ca na yujyate ||
SA20n1396:1771: yadāsargastadeśvara itīśvarahetukaḥ sarga iti na yujyate |
SA20n1396:1773: tena tadicchāhetuko vā syādicchāṃ vā sthāpayitvā tadanyopādānahetukaḥ |
SA20n1396:1777: yadeśvarastadecchā yadecchā tadeśvara iti nityaṃ sargeṇa bhavitavyaṃ |
SA20n1396:1780: tatra ca neśvaro jagadīśvara iti na yujyate ||
SA20n1396:1791: yaśca juhoti yaśca hūyate ye ca tatsahāyāsteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ svargamanāya bhavatīti |
SA20n1396:1793: utsaṃsthavāda eṣa śaṭhaviṭhapito natu yuktimabhisamīkṣya vyavasthāpitaḥ |
SA20n1396:1794: kaliyuge pratyupasthite brāhmaṇaiḥ paurāṇaṃ brāhmaṇadharmamatikramya māṃsaṃ bhakṣayitukāmairetatpratyupakalpitaṃ ||
SA20n1396:1795: apitu sa idaṃ syādvacanīyaḥ kaccidicchasi yo'
SA20n1396:1796: sau mantravidhiḥ sa dharmasvabhāvo vādharmasvabhāvo veti |
SA20n1396:1803: evaṃ vyāvṛtte ca punaḥ satyuttari vadet |
SA20n1396:1804: tadyathā nāma viṣaṃ mantravidhiparigṛhītaṃ na vinipātayati |

SA20n1396:1809: sa ca praśamo na kutracitkadācitkasyacittathopalabhyata iti na yujyate ||
SA20n1396:1811: tena yathā mantravidhirbāhyaṃ viṣaṃ praśamayati tathādharmamiti na yujyate ||
SA20n1396:1815: iṣṭaḥ svajana ādito na hūyata iti na yujyate |
SA20n1396:1822: tena paśurapi paśukāyaṃ hitvā devakāyaṃ gṛhṇātīti na yujyate |
SA20n1396:1824: sau mantrāṇāṃ praṇetā sa śaktaḥ kāruṇiko vā |
SA20n1396:1827: tadāntareṇa prāṇātipātaṃ sarvaṃ lokaṃ svargaṃ nayatīti na yujyate |
SA20n1396:1837: yacca na dharmāya kalpate tasya lakṣaṇaṃ vakṣyāmi |
SA20n1396:1838: yatparavyābādhakaṃ karma na ca dṛṣṭaṃ doṣapratikriyaṃ tattāvanna dharmāya kalpate |
SA20n1396:1840: yacca sarvajñairekāṃśena bhāṣitaṃ makuśalamiti svayamanīpsitaṃ ca yat |
SA20n1396:1842: vidyādimaṅgalopetaṃ ca yat tadapi na dharmāya bhavati ||
SA20n1396:1845: tadyathāpīhaikatyaḥ śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā laukikadhyānasaṃniśrayeṇāntasaṃjñī lokasya viharatyanantakasaṃjñī ubhayasaṃjñī nobhayasaṃjñī |
SA20n1396:1850: tatrocchedaparyavasānato lokasyāntaṃ samanveṣamāṇo yadā saṃvartakalpaṃ samanusmarati tadāntakasaṃjñī bhavati |
SA20n1396:1857: tadvipakṣeṇa vā punarvyañjanaviśeṣābhiniveśo na tvarthābhiniveśo naivāntakasaṃjñī nāpyanantakasaṃjñī ||
SA20n1396:1874: jñānabhayabhītaśca spaṣṭaṃ na vyākaroti na jānāmīti |
SA20n1396:1875: dvitīyaḥ paryanuyogabhayabhīto mṛṣāvādabhayabhīto mithyādṛṣṭibhayabhītaḥ spaṣṭaṃ na vyākarotyadhigatavānasmīti |
SA20n1396:1876: tṛtīyo mithyādṛṣṭibhayabhītaḥ paryanuyogabhayabhītaḥ spaṣṭaṃ na vyākarotyahamadhigatavānasmīti |
SA20n1396:1878: caturthaḥ paryanuyogabhayabhīta evaṃ sarveṇa sarvamabhyudayamārgo niḥśreyasamārga iti vyañjanamātrakuśalo'
SA20n1396:1892: so'pi dhyānasaṃniśrayeṇa tarkasaṃniśrayeṇa ca dvividho yathāsūtrameva veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1396:1893: kena kāraṇena tarkasaṃniśrayeṇaivaṃ paśyatyahetukamutpanna ātmā lokaśca samāsena |
SA20n1396:1894: anabhisandhipūrvakamādhyātmikabāhyānāṃ bhāvānāmaparimāṇaṃ vaicitryamupalabhya hetūnāṃ caikadā vaicitryamupalabhya akasmādekadā vāyavo vānti ekadā na vānti |
SA20n1396:1895: akasmādekadā nadyaḥ syandanti ekadā na syandanti |
SA20n1396:1896: akasmādeke vṛkṣāḥ puṣpanti phalanti ekadā na puṣpanti na phalantītyevamādi ||
SA20n1396:1902: tenāhaṃ pūrvaṃ nābhūvaṃ paścātsamutpanna iti na yujyate ||

SA20n1396:1944: nāsti dattaṃ nāstīṣṭamiti vistareṇa yāvanna loke'rhanniti |

SA20n1396:1991: ye te tathāgatabhāṣitāḥ sūtrāntā gambhīrā gambhīrābhāsā nirabhilapyadharmatāmārabhya |

SA20n1396:2069: kaccidicchasi yonita eva yo viśiṣṭaḥ sa vara āhosvicchru tena śīlena vā punaḥ |
SA20n1396:2071: tena yajñe yaḥ śrutapradhānaḥ śīlapradhānaḥ sa pramāṇaṃ parigrāhya iti na yujyate ||
SA20n1396:2072: sacecchrutena vā śīlena vā tena brāhmaṇā agro varṇo hīno'
SA20n1396:2087: yathāpīhaikatyaḥ śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vaivaṃdṛṣṭirbhavatyevaṃvādī yataścātmā muktiṃ cittavaśitāṃ cānuprāpto yogavaśitāṃ cānuprāpto divyaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūtaḥ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
SA20n1396:2089: yataśca viviktaṃ kāmairviviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ savitarka savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānamupasampadya viharati |
SA20n1396:2092: yathāpi tadevaṃdṛṣṭirbhavatyevaṃvādī sarvapāpānyasyāpaharati yo nadyāṃ sundarikāyāṃ snāti |
SA20n1396:2093: yathā sundarikāyāmevaṃ bāhudāyāṃ gayāyāṃ sarasvatyāṃ nadyāṃ gaṅgāyāṃ |
SA20n1396:2095: yathāpīhaikatyaḥ kukkuravratena śuddhiṃ manyate govratena nakulavratena nagnabratena bhasmavratena kaṣṭavratena niṣṭhāvratenetyevaṃbhāgīyairvratasamādānaiḥ śuddhaṃ manyate |

SA20n1396:2107: sau pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ krīḍati sa kāmavītarāgo vāvītarāgo veti |
SA20n1396:2108: sa cedvītarāgaḥ krīḍati ramate paricārayatīti na yujyate |

SA20n1396:2112: sacet sarvavītarāgaḥ yāvaccaturthaṃ dhyānamupasampadya viharatīti na yujyate |
SA20n1396:2118: tena tīrthasnānena viśudhyata iti na yujyate |
SA20n1396:2125: śucisammatā loka iti tadupādānena śuddhirna yujyate |
SA20n1396:2127: tena prakūtyā śuci vastu śuddhaye saṃvartata iti na yujyate ||
SA20n1396:2128: kaccidicchasi sati kukkurādivratopādāne kāyaduścaritādimithyāpratipattiḥ śuddhaye saṃvartate kāyasucaritādisamyakpratipattirveti |
SA20n1396:2130: tena mithyā ca pratipadyate śuddhyate ceti na yujyate |
SA20n1396:2132: tena kukkurādi vratamapārthakamiti tena śuddhiriti na yujyate ||
SA20n1396:2143: yathāpīhaikatyaḥ śramaṇo brāhmaṇo vaivaṃdṛṣṭirbhavatyevaṃvādī ādityacandragrahatithivaiguṇyena manorathānāmasiddhirbhavati |
SA20n1396:2153: sa ca lābhī bhavati laukikānāṃ dhyānānāṃ |
