SA20n1396:2161: tena puṇyakarmaṇāmapuṇyakarmaṇāṃ ca yāvajjīvamanuvartanīyā sampattirvipattiśca saṃdṛśyata iti na yujyate |
SA20n1396:2169: itīme ṣoaḍaśa paravādā abhinirhārayā parīkṣyāyuktyopaparīkṣitāḥ sarvathā na yujyante ||
SA20n1396:2187: yo dharma utpadyamānaḥ svayaṃ cāpraśāntalakṣaṇa utpadyate |
SA20n1396:2199: syātpañcavidho duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyaḥ samudayadarśanaprahātavyo nirodhadarśanaprahātavyo mārgadarśanaprahātavyo bhāvanādarśanaprahātavyaśca ||
SA20n1396:2202: syātsaptavidhaḥ saptānuśayāḥ kāmarāgānuśayaḥ pratighānuśayo bhavarāgānuśayo mānānuśayo'
SA20n1396:2207: anunayasaṃyojanaṃ pratighasaṃyojanaṃ mānasaṃyojanamavidyāsaṃyojanaṃ dṛṣṭisaṃyojanaṃ parāmarśasaṃyojanaṃ vicikitsāsaṃyojana mīrṣyāsaṃyojanaṃ mātsaryasaṃyojanaṃ ca ||
SA20n1396:2208: syāddaśavidhaḥ satkāyadṛṣṭirantagrāhadṛṣṭirmithyā dṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ śīlaparāmarśo rāgaḥ pratigho māno'
SA20n1396:2217: tatra kāmāvacare duḥkhasatye samudayasatye kāmāvacarādhipateye nirodhasatye mārgasatye sarve daśakleśā vipratipannāḥ |
SA20n1396:2218: rūpāvacare duḥkhasatye samudayasatye tadādhipateye nirodhasatye mārgasatye pratighavarjāsta eva daśa kleśā vipratipannāḥ |
SA20n1396:2220: kāmāvacarapratipakṣe bhāvanāyāṃ ṣaṭ kleśā vipratipannā mithyādṛṣṭiṃ dṛṣṭiparāmarśaṃ śīlavrataparāmarśaṃ vicikitsāṃ ca sthāpayitvā ||
SA20n1396:2221: rūpāvacarapratipakṣe bhāvanāyāṃ pañca kleśā vipratipannā ebhya eva ṣaḍbhyaḥ pratighaṃ sthāpayitvā ||
SA20n1396:2225: asatpuruṣasevāmāgamyāsaddharmaśravaṇamayoniśo manaskāraṃ naisargikaṃ vā punaḥ smṛtisampramoṣaṃ pañcopādānaskandhānātmano vātmīyato vā samanupaśyato yā nirdhāritā kliṣṭā prajñā ||
SA20n1396:2227: asatpuruṣasaṃsevāmāgamyāsaddharma śravaṇamayoniśo manaskāraṃ naisargikaṃ vā punasmṛtisampramoṣaṃ pañcopādānaskandhānātmato gṛhītvā śāśvatato vocchedato vā samanupaśyato yā nirdhāritā'
SA20n1396:2230: asatpuruṣasevāmāgamyāsaddharmaśravaṇamayoniśo manaskāraṃ hetuṃ vāpavadataḥ phalaṃ vā kriyāṃ vā sadbhāvaṃ vastu nāśayato yā nirdhāritaiva kliṣṭā prajñā ||
SA20n1396:2232: asatpuruṣa sevāmāgamyāsaddharmaśravaṇamayoniśo manaskāraṃ satkāyadṛṣṭimantagrāhadṛṣṭiṃ sāśrayāṃ sālambanāṃ sanidānāṃ sahabhūsamprayogāṃ paradṛṣṭimupanidhāyāgrataḥ śreṣṭhato viśiṣṭataḥ paramataśca samanupaśyato yā nirdhāritaiva kliṣṭā prajñā ||
SA20n1396:2235: yattāmeva dṛṣṭiṃ taddṛṣṭyanucaraṃ śīlaṃ vā vrataṃ vā sāśrayaṃ sālambanaṃ sanidānaṃ sasahabhūsamprayogaṃ śuddhito muktito nairyāṇikataśca samanupaśyato yā nirdhāritaiva kliṣṭā prajñā ||
SA20n1396:2237: asatpuruṣasevāmāgamyāsaddharmaśravaṇamayoniśomanaskāraṃ naisargikaṃ vā smṛtisampramoṣaṃ bahirdhādhyātmaṃ vā nirdhāritamiṣṭaviṣayādyavasānaṃ ||
SA20n1396:2243: naisargikaṃ vā smṛtisampramoṣamāgamya yādhyātmaṃ bahirdhā vā nirdhāritā'
SA20n1396:2244: nirdhāritā vā uccanīcatāyāṃ hīnapraṇītatāyāṃ ca cittasya unnatiḥ ||
SA20n1396:2246: asatpuruṣaṃ smṛtisampramoṣaṃ yajjñeye vastuni nirdhāritaṃ vānirdhāritaṃ vā kliṣṭamajñānaṃ ||
SA20n1396:2248: asatpuruṣaṃ manaskāraṃ yā jñeye vastuni nirdhāritaiva saṃśaya matiḥ |
SA20n1396:2268: anuśayāvasthā paryavasthānāvasthā parikalpitāvasthā sahajāvasthā mṛdvavasthā madhyāvasthādhimātrāvasthā ||
SA20n1396:2280: api khalu saptabhirmukhaiḥ sarvakleśā darśanabhāvanāvibandhakarā āvaraṇabhūtā veditavyāḥ |
SA20n1396:2281: tadyathā mithyāvagamanataḥ anavagamanataḥ avagamānavagamanataḥ mithyāvagamapratipattitaḥ tannidānapadasthānataḥ taduttrāsasaṃjananataḥ nisargasamudācārataśca ||
SA20n1396:2284: samāsataḥ ṣaḍvidhākārairāpattita upapattitaḥ santānato vastutaḥ karmasamutthānataḥ paryantataśca |
SA20n1396:2287: tatra santānato yo rāgādicaritānāṃ paripakvendriyāṇāṃ yūnāmaparinirvāṇakadharmāṇāṃ ca |
SA20n1396:2290: tatra karmasamutthānato yena kleśaparyavasthānenābhibhūtaḥ paryāptaḥ kāyavākkarma samutthāpayati |
SA20n1396:2302: yo'nitye nityamiti duḥkhe sukhamiti aśacau śucīti anātmanyātmeti saṃjñāparikalpaḥ ||
SA20n1396:2304: ya statraiva tathā saṃjñāparikalpite kṣāntī rucirvyavasthāpanābhiniveśaḥ ||
SA20n1396:2313: viparyāsaniṣyando mithyādṛṣṭirantagrāhadṛṣṭerekadeśaḥ pratigho māno vicikitsā ca ||
SA20n1396:2319: śīlavrataparāmarśo duḥkhe sukhamiti viparyāsaḥ rāga ubhayathā apyaśucau śucīti viparyāsaḥ |
SA20n1396:2325: saṃyojanāni bandhanānyanuśayā upakleśāḥ paryavasthānāni oghā upādānāni granthā nīvaraṇāni khilā malā nighrāḥ śalyāni kiñcanā mūlāni duścaritānyāsravā vighātāḥ paridāhā upāyāsā raṇā agnayojvarā vanasthā vinibandhāścetyevaṃbhāgīyāḥ kleśaparyāyāḥ ||
SA20n1396:2352: prādhānyāttu bhagavatā tasmiṃstasmiṃnsparyāye te te kleśāḥ sthāpitāḥ ||
SA20n1396:2361: oghā iti catvāra oghāḥ kāmaugho bhavaugho dṛṣṭyogho'
SA20n1396:2372: yathā khilānyevaṃ malā nidhāni śalyāni kiñcana duścaritāni ca ||
SA20n1396:2380: yathā vighātā evaṃ paridāhā upāyāsā raṇā agnayo jvarā vanathāḥ |
SA20n1396:2381: vinibandhā iti pañca vinibandhā kāyāpekṣā kāmāpekṣā saṃsṛṣṭavihāritā ānulomikakathāvaikalyaṃ alpāvara mātrasantuṣṭiśca ||
SA20n1396:2384: tadyathā kleśa utpadyamāna ādita eva cittaṃ saṃkleśayati ālambane viparyāsaṃ karoti |
SA20n1396:2388: dṛṣṭadharmikamavadyaṃ prasavati sāmparāyikaṃ tajjaṃ caitasikaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayate |
SA20n1396:2403: gurutātha viparyāsaḥ paryāyo doṣa eva ca ||
SA20n1396:2410: yo dharma utpadyamāno abhisaṃskāralakṣaṇaścotpadyate tasya cotpādātkāyābhisaṃskāro vāgabhisaṃskārastaduttarakālaṃ pravartate |
SA20n1396:2427: tatra pudgalalakṣaṇavyavasthānaṃ yathoktaṃ yathā prāṇātipātikaḥ khalu bhavati vistareṇa yathāsūtraṃ tatra prāṇātipātikaḥ khalu bhavatītyuddeśapadamidaṃ |
SA20n1396:2436: yojanaśatasyārvāgye prāṇinastebhyaḥ saṃvṛtā vā bhavantyasaṃvṛtā veti |
SA20n1396:2438: ta eva punarevamāhuryathā vṛkṣādayo bāhyabhāvāḥ prāṇibhūtā iti |
SA20n1396:2440: iti satpuṇyaviratipratipakṣaśca khyāpito bhavati asatpuṇyaviratipratipakṣaśca khyāpito bhavati ||
SA20n1396:2445: sati pratyaye vyutthānāvakāśaḥ paridīpito yāvadaviratastāvat prāṇātipātika iti samāsārthaḥ ||
SA20n1396:2446: punaḥ sarvairebhiḥ padaiḥ prāṇātipātikaṃ liṅgaṃ prāṇātipātakriyā prāṇātipātanidānaṃ prāṇātipātavastukriyāprabhedaśca paridīpito bhavati ||
SA20n1396:2450: yacca prāṇinaṃ ghātayataḥ prāṇātipātikatvamasya bhavati tadetatparidīpitamiti |
SA20n1396:2454: tadeva yadgrāme sthāpitaṃ sañcāritaṃ vāraṇyagataṃ veti |
SA20n1396:2455: yadaraṇye jātaṃ vā saṃkṣiptaṃ vā sañcāritaṃ vā tadeva steyasaṃkhyātamiti |
SA20n1396:2460: tatra yaddāyakena svāminā na pūrvaṃ dattaṃ dānayogena tadadattamityucyate |
SA20n1396:2476: yathāpi tanmātāpitarau svāṃ duhitaṃ patipariṇayananimittaṃ tadanyena saha maiuthunato gopayati rakṣati kālena kālamavalokayati |
SA20n1396:2477: uparate vā punastasmin sambandhena bhrātrā vā bhaginyā vā rakṣitā bhavati |
SA20n1396:2484: sā khalveṣā pariṇītāyāstrividhārakṣā paridīpitā bhavati samāsataḥ gurusnigdhajanāvalokanārakṣā rājayuktakulārakṣā dvārapālārakṣā ca ||
SA20n1396:2494: mithyācāritramāpadyata iti anaṅgādeśākāleṣu ye svasyāmapi bhāryāyāṃ sāvadyā bhavanti iti samāsārthaḥ ||
SA20n1396:2495: punaryāṃ gacchato yathāgacchataḥ kāmamithyācāro bhavati tadetatparidīpitaṃ ||
SA20n1396:2497: apṛthaccheṇyaḥ pariṣad tāsāṃ samavāyaścāturdiśasya janakāyasya tribhirvyavahārairanubhūtaṃ yattajjñānaṃ |
SA20n1396:2502: āmiṣakiñcitkahetoriti dhanadhānyahiraṇyādinimittaṃ mṛṣāvācaṃ bhāṣata iti vinidhāya ruciṃ dṛṣṭiṃ bhāṣaṇāt |
SA20n1396:2504: nyathā bhāṣaṇato nidānataḥ saṃjñāvivādataśca mṛṣāvādo veditavyaḥ ||
SA20n1396:2512: vyagrarataḥ prītisambhavavilopane kliṣṭacittatayā vyagrakaraṇīṃ vācaṃ bhāṣate'
SA20n1396:2514: samāsārthaḥ punarbhedābhiprāyatā abhinnabhedaprayogatā bhinnabhedaprayogatā bhedakliṣṭacittatā paraprayojanatā ca paridīpitā bhavati ||
SA20n1396:2528: sā khalveṣā nelāmupādāya yāvadaparyādattāntā trividhā veditavyā |
SA20n1396:2537: yā sammodikā sā bahujanasyeṣṭā kāntā priyā manāpā ca |
SA20n1396:2552: cintayitvā samyagupanidhyāya deśanayā niśamya vācaṃ bhāṣitā bhavati ||
SA20n1396:2553: paribhūya śṛṇvate deśanā parakāle na pūrveṇāparasambaddhārthatayā prakīrṇā |
SA20n1396:2558: samāsārthaḥ punaryathā nirdiṣṭakālatraye saṃbhinnapralāpa eva paridīpitaḥ ||
SA20n1396:2564: yatpareṣāṃ tanmama syādityabhidhyāyāḥ pravṛttyākāra eṣa paridīpitaḥ samāsato'
SA20n1396:2576: trividhābhiprāyasya dānasyāpavādādbhogābhiprāyasya śuddhyabhiprāyasya devatāpūjābhiprāyasya nāsti dattaṃ nāstīṣṭaṃ nāsti hutamityāha |
SA20n1396:2580: tasya trividhasya savipakṣapratipakṣasya kuśalasyāpavādānnāsti sukṛtaduṣkṛta karmaṇāṃ phalavipāka ityāha |
SA20n1396:2593: bhāvanāmārgeṇopasampādya iti svayaṃ ca jñānātpareṣāṃ cāropaṇātsvasyādhigamasya pravedayante iti kṣīṇā me jātirityevamādi pūrvavadvibhāgo veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1396:2596: tatra kriyā bījopanikṣepaṇakriyā dhāraṇākriyā āgamanagamanakriyā upapattisaṃvartanīyakarmakriyā ||
SA20n1396:2600: tatra pravṛttyapavāde hetvapavādo draṣṭavyo na svalakṣaṇāpavādaḥ |
SA20n1396:2601: nivṛttyapavāde punarguṇāpavādo draṣṭavyo na pudgalavāda iti ||
SA20n1396:2619: tadanyena hastasaṃsargādikenopāyena śukraśoṇitavimokṣaṇādapraṇidhāya ca brahmacaryābhyupagamādvirato grāmadharmāt |
SA20n1396:2625: tatra tatrādhikaraṇe prāmāṇikatvena sthāpyate tathā ca viśvāsa māpanneṣvavisaṃvādanādanabhidrohaṇādavisaṃvādakaḥ ||
SA20n1396:2631: vadhābhiprāyasya kliṣṭacetasaḥ paraprāṇini tatraiva vadhaprayoge vadhaniṣṭhāyāṃ yatkāyakarma ||
SA20n1396:2633: apahārābhiprāyasya kliṣṭacetasaḥ paraparigṛhīte vastuni tatraivāhāraprayoge tatraivāpahāraniṣṭhāyāṃ yatkāyakarma ||
SA20n1396:2635: sevābhiprāyasya kliṣṭacetasaḥ agamyānaṅgādeśākāleṣu tatraiva kāmamithyācāraprayogaḥ kāmamithyācāraniṣṭhāyāṃ ca yat kāya karma ||
SA20n1396:2637: vinidhāya saṃjñāṃ vaktu kāmasya kliṣṭacetasaḥ parasattve tatraiva kūṭasākṣiprayoge kūṭasākṣiniṣṭhāyāṃ ca yadvākkarma |
SA20n1396:2639: bhedābhiprāyasya kliṣṭacetasaḥ parasattveṣu tatraiva bhedaprayoge bhedaniṣṭhāyāṃ ca yadvākkarma |
SA20n1396:2641: paruṣaṃ vaktukāmasya kliṣṭacetasaḥ parasattveṣu tatraiva paruṣavacanaprayoge paruṣavacananiṣṭhāyāṃ ca yadvākkarma ||
SA20n1396:2647: parasvīkaraṇābhiprāyasya kliṣṭacetasaḥ parasvīkaraṇābhiprāye niścayaprayoge tanniṣṭhāyāṃ ca yanmanaskarma ||
SA20n1396:2649: paravyāpādābhiprāyasya kliṣṭacetasaḥ paravyāpādābhiprāyaniścayaprayoge tanniṣṭhāyāṃ ca yanmanaskarma ||
SA20n1396:2654: prāṇātipāta ādīnavābhiprāyasya kuśalacetasastatsaṃyamaprayoge tat saṃyamaniṣṭhāyāṃ ca yatkāyakarma ||
SA20n1396:2657: adattādāna ādīnavābhiprāyasya yāvanmithyādṛṣṭāvādīnavābhiprāyasya kuśalacetasa tatsaṃyamaprayoge tatsaṃyamaniṣṭhāyāṃ ca yanmanaskarma ||
SA20n1396:2663: lobho dveṣo mohaḥ ātmā para parānuvṛttirāmiṣabhayamapakāranimittaṃ krīḍāratidharmasaṃjñā mithyādṛṣṭiśca ||
SA20n1396:2670: mṛdunā kuśalena manuṣyeṣūtpadyate madhyena kāmāvacareṣu deveṣu |
SA20n1396:2676: kuśalaṃ vā punaralobhādveṣāmohanidānaṃ tathaiva yathāyogaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ |
SA20n1396:2686: tatra vipākaphalataḥ prāṇātipāta ātmacitte bhāvite bahulīkṛte narakeṣu vipāko vipacyate |
SA20n1396:2702: akuśalānāṃ karmaṇāmāsevitatvād bhāvitatvādbahulīkṛtatvāttenādhipatinā bāhyā bhāvā alpaujaskaphalā bhavanti asampannaphalāḥ pūtiphalāḥ parivṛttaphalāḥ śīrṇaphalā asvāduphalā asadāphalā alpakaphalā apathyaphalā aphalāśca |
SA20n1396:2705: dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ karma dṛṣṭaphalaṃ bhavatyakuśalaṃ vā kuśalaṃ vā |
SA20n1396:2709: pakārāśayaḥ karuṇāśaya āghātāśayaḥ prasādāśayaḥ kṛtaghnāśayaḥ kṛtajñāśayaśca ||
SA20n1396:2726: yathāpīhaikatyo buddhe vā dharme vā saṅghe vānyatamānyatamasminvā gurusthānīye vastunyadhimātramāghātāśayaṃ pratighātāśayamabhisaṃskaroti ||
SA20n1396:2729: yathāpīhaikatyo buddhe vā dharme vā saṅghe bādhimātraṃ prasādāśayamadhibhuktyāśayamabhisaṃskaroti ||
SA20n1396:2732: yathāpīhaikatyo mātari vā pitari vānyatamānyatamasminvopakāravastunyadhimātraṃ kṛtaghnāśayamabhidrohāśayaṃ raudrāśayamabhisaṃskaroti ||
SA20n1396:2735: yathāpīhaikatyo mātari pitari vānyatamānyatamasminvopakāravastunyadhimātraṃ kṛtajñāśayaṃ pratyupakārāśayamadhimātra mabhisaṃskaroti ||
SA20n1396:2745: devatāyataneṣu vā catvareṣu vā śṛṅgāṭakeṣu vā paśuvadhamanupravartayati |
SA20n1396:2746: viśvastaṃ vā paramaviśvāsaprāptaṃ mitraṃ vā suhṛdaṃ vā vayasyakaṃ vā druhyativpaṃsayati vipravāsayati |
SA20n1396:2747: duḥkhitaṃ vā punarniṣkiñcanamanāthamapratiśaraṇaṃ śaraṇāgatamapradānenopa gṛhyottaratrābhidruhyati pīḍāyai pratipadyate |
SA20n1396:2752: yathāpīhaikatyo mātaramaśrāddhāṃ śraddhāsampadi samādāpayati vinayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati |
SA20n1396:2758: evaṃ karuṇāyānirodhasamāpatteḥ srotaāpattiphalādvyutthitamarhatvaphalācca piṇḍakena pratipādayati kārānvā prayuṃkte |
SA20n1396:2761: eṣveva vā punarvastuṣu viparyayeṇākuśalamapi karma dṛṣṭhadharmavedanīyaṃ bhavatyapakāranaimittikaṃ ||
SA20n1396:2768: yathā buddhā evaṃ cakravartino maitravihāriṇaśca bodhisattvāḥ |
SA20n1396:2769: tathā bodhisattvaḥ karuṇāśayo daridrān duḥkhitān daivopahatān sattvānabhisamīkṣyānnena pānena dhanena dhānyena kośena santarpayati |
SA20n1396:2770: te ca tena pratyayena sukhasparśaṃ viharanti |
SA20n1396:2775: prāṇopaghāto bhogopaghāto dāropaghātaḥ kūṭasākṣyupaghātaḥ sahāyopaghāto doṣasamākhyānopaghātaḥ prasādopasaṃhāropaghāto bhayopasaṃhāropaghātaśca |
SA20n1396:2782: yathāpīhaikatyastīvreṇa lobhadveṣamohaparyavasānena tīvreṇa vālobhādveṣāmohābhisaṃskāreṇa karma samutthāpayati |
SA20n1396:2784: yathāpīhaikatyena kuśalamakuśalaṃ vā karma dīrgharātramāsevitaṃ bhavati bhāvitaṃ bahulīkṛtaṃ ||
SA20n1396:2795: yathāpīhaikatyo buddhe vā dharme vā saṅghe vānyatamānyatamasminvā gurusthānīye vastuni gurukavastukamevāpakāraṃ vopakāraṃ vā prayuṅkte ||
SA20n1396:2797: yathāpīhaikatya ekāṃśenaivākuśalaṃ karma samādāya vartate yāvajjīvaṃ |
SA20n1396:2801: kuśalaṃ karma vipakṣabhūtaṃ prahāya kuśalaṃ karma viśodhayati ||
SA20n1396:2810: tatra cāsti prāṇātipāto no tu prāṇātipātikamavadyam api tu prāṇātipātajātīyaṃ prāṇātipātasadṛśamanusabhāgamavadyaṃ prasavati |
SA20n1396:2811: no cedanyaṃ prāṇinaṃ ghātayati apitvaprāṇibhūte vastuni prahṛtya prāṇī me ghātita iti manyate |
SA20n1396:2812: tatra nāsti prāṇātipāto nāsti prāṇātipātikamavadyamapitu prāṇātipātajātīyaṃ prāṇātipātasadṛśamanusabhāgamavadyaṃ prasavati ||
SA20n1396:2813: yathā prāṇātipāta evamadattādānādiṣu karmapatheṣu kriyāviparyāso yathāyogaṃ veditavyaḥ ||
SA20n1396:2818: nāsti ghnato vā ghātayato vā adattamādadānasya kāmeṣu mithyācarato mṛṣāvācaṃ bhāṣamāṇasya paiśunyamācarataḥ paruṣāṃ vācaṃ bhāṣamāṇasya saṃbhinnaṃ pralapato dānāni vāpunardadata upavāsamupavasataḥ puṇyāni kurvataḥ śīlaṃ samādāya vartamānasya nāstyato nidānaṃ pāpaṃ vā puṇyaṃ veti |
SA20n1396:2821: hatvā ca punastatonidānaṃ puṇyameva bhavati na pāpaṃ |
SA20n1396:2822: teṣu cādattādānaṃ kāmamithyācāro mṛṣāvādaḥ paiśunyaṃ pāruṣyaṃ saṃbhinnapralāpaḥ puṇyāyaiva bhavati nāpuṇyāya ||
SA20n1396:2850: vaṅkakarma doṣakarma kaṣāyakarma śucikarma munikarma ceti ||
SA20n1396:2852: yaccetitaṃ cetayitvā punaḥ kāyena vācā samutthāpitaṃ |
SA20n1396:2853: akṛtaṃ karma yadacetitamacetayitvā punarna kāyena na vācā samutthāpitaṃ ||
SA20n1396:2856: tadyathā svapnakṛtamajñānakṛtamasañcityakṛtamatīvrānatitīkṣṇakṛtaṃ bhrāntikṛtaṃ smṛtisampramoṣakṛtamanicchākṛtaṃ prakṛtyavyākṛtaṃ vipratisāropahataṃ pratipakṣopahataṃ ca |
SA20n1396:2868: saṃvarasaṃgṛhītaṃ karma yatprātimokṣasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītaṃ vā dhyānasamāpattiprahāṇasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītaṃ vānāsravasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītaṃ vā ||
SA20n1396:2872: aurabhrikāḥ kaukkuṭikāḥ saukarikāḥ śvaśākuntikāḥ śaśavāgurikāścaurā vadhyaghātā bandhanapālakāḥ sūcakāḥ kāraṇākārāpakā nāgabandhakā nāgamaṇḍalikāśca ||
SA20n1396:2874: trividhaṃ ca saṃvaraṃ sthāpayitvā āsaṃvarikanaikāyikaṃ ca karma sthāpayitvā tadanyanaikāyikaṃ yatkuśalākuśalāvyākṛtaṃ karma dānamayaṃ nidānataḥ samutthānataḥ svabhāvato'
SA20n1396:2878: samutthānataḥ deyavastu parityāgāya kāyavākkarmasamutthāpikā cetanā alobhādveṣāmohasahagatā |
SA20n1396:2881: yathā dānamayamevaṃ śīlamayaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ yathāyogaṃ veditavyaṃ ||
SA20n1396:2882: tatra śīlamayasya nidānaṃ samutthānaṃ ca tulyaṃ |
SA20n1396:2886: tatsahagataḥ samādhiḥ nirhārikā cetanā svabhāvaḥ samādhiradhiṣṭhānaṃ daśasu dikṣu aduḥkhāsukhikaḥ sattvadhātuḥ |
SA20n1396:2888: puṇyaṃ karma yatsugativaipākyaṃ pañcagativedanīyaṃ ca kuśalaṃ |
SA20n1396:2890: āniñjyaṃ karma yadrūpārūpyavaipākyaṃ rūpyārūpyavedanīyaṃ ca kuśalaṃ ca karma |
SA20n1396:2899: anāgataṃ karma yadanirvṛttaṃ vartamānaṃ karma yadabhisaṃskṛtamabhisañcitamanuparataṃ |
SA20n1396:2905: naiva śaikṣanāśaikṣaṃ karma tadubhayaṃ sthāpayitvā tadanyasantānikaṃ yat kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtaṃ |
SA20n1396:2915: yallokottaramanāsravaṃ karma trayāṇāmapi karmaṇāṃ prahāṇāya pratipakṣatvād vaṅkakṛrma yadito bāhyānāṃ tīrthyānāṃ kuśalākuśalaṃ |
SA20n1396:2919: doṣakarma yadiha dhārmikāṇāṃ pṛthagjanānāṃ śāsane viparītadarśināṃ svayaṃ dṛṣṭiparāmarśasthāyināṃ mithyāniścitānāṃ yatkuśalākuśalaṃ karma |
SA20n1396:2921: api khalu kaṣāyakarma yadiha dhārmikāṇāṃ pṛthagjanānāṃ śāsane'
SA20n1396:2923: śucikarma yadiha dhārmikāṇāṃ pṛthagjanānāṃ śāsane samyaṅniścitānāmasandigdhabuddhīnāṃ kuśalaṃ karma |
SA20n1396:2924: munikarma yadiha dhārmikāṇāmapṛthagjanānāmāryāṇāṃ śaikṣāśaikṣaṃ kuśalaṃ karma |
SA20n1396:2932: yathāpi prāṇātipātikaḥ prāṇātipātādhikaraṇahetorātmavyābādhāya cetayate paravyābādhāyobhayavyābādhāya dṛṣṭadhārmikamavadyaṃ prasavati sāmparāyikaṃ |
SA20n1396:2935: prāṇivyābādhāya prayuktastato nidānaṃ vadhaṃ bandhanaṃ vā jyāniṃ vā garhaṇāṃ vā prāpnoti |
SA20n1396:2939: no tu tatonidānaṃ vadhaṃ vā yāvadgarhaṇāṃ vā nigacchati |
SA20n1396:2941: yattathaiva prayuktaḥ paraṃ ca vyābādhate tannidānaṃ ca parato vadhaṃ vā yāvadgarhaṇāṃ vā nigacchati |
SA20n1396:2946: kathaṃ tajjaṃ caitasikaduḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayate prāṇivyābādhāya prayuṅkte |
SA20n1396:2948: na cāsya prāṇātipātaḥ sampadyate yathepsitaḥ saḥ |
SA20n1396:2949: icchāmūla nidānaṃ tajjaṃ caitasikaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayate ||
SA20n1396:2950: api khalu daśādīnavā dauḥśīlye yathāsūtramevaṃ vistareṇa veditavyāḥ |
SA20n1396:2951: caturṇāṃ punarakuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ surāmaireyasya pañcamasyopāsakaśikṣāsambandhenādīnavā uktā bhagavatā te'
SA20n1396:2976: yathāpīhaikatyaścaṇḍālakuleṣu vā pukkasakuleṣu vā rathakārakuleṣu vā veṇukārakuleṣu vā iti yāni vā punaranyāni nīcāni adhamāni kṛcchrāṇi kṛcchravṛttīni parīttāni parīttānnapānabhojanāni ityevaṃrūpeṣu kuleṣvabhijāto bhavati |
SA20n1396:2979: yathāpīhaikatyaḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakuleṣu brāhmaṇamahāśālakuleṣu vā gṛhapatimahāśālakuleṣu vā iti yāni vā punaranyāni kulānyāḍhyāni mahādhanāni mahābhogāni prabhūtavittopakaraṇāni prabhūtakṣetra svāpateyāni prabhūtadhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgārasannicayāni ityevaṃrūpeṣu kuleṣvabhijāto bhavati |
SA20n1396:2992: apramāṇasaṃjñiṣu akiñcanasaṃjñiṣu naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñiṣu ca deveṣu janma ||
SA20n1396:2994: daśasu dikṣvaparimāṇeṣu lokadhātuṣyaparimāṇānāṃ sattvānāmaparimāṇaṃ janma veditavyaṃ ||
SA20n1396:2998: yaccaturṣu mahāsamudreṣūdakamato bahutaraṃ yuṣmākaṃ dīrghamadhvānaṃ saṃdhāvatāṃ saṃsaratāṃ rudhiraṃ prasyanditaṃ praghāritaṃ |
SA20n1396:3000: dīrgharātraṃ yūyaṃ hastināṃ sabhāgatāyāmupapannā aśvānāmuṣṭrāṇāṃ gardabhānāmajāmahiṣavarāhakurkurāṇāṃ sabhāgatāyāmupapannāḥ |
SA20n1396:3001: tatra yuṣmābhirbahūnyaṅgapratyaṅgacchedanānyanubhūtāni yatra yuṣmākaṃ prabhūtaṃ rudhiraṃ prasyanditaṃ praghāritaṃ |
SA20n1396:3003: tatra yuṣmābhiḥ prabhūtāni mātṛvyasanāni pitṛvyasanāni bhrātṛvyasanāni bhaginīvyasanāni jñātikṣayo dhanakṣayo bhogakṣayaścānubhūtaḥ |
SA20n1396:3005: tadyathā rudhiramaśru ca evaṃ mātuḥstanyapānaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ |
SA20n1396:3009: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā tadyathā yadasyā pṛthivyāṃ tṛṇakāṣṭhaśākhāpatra...taścaturaṅgulamātrāḥ kaṭhikāḥ kṛtvā mātāpitṛparamparāyāmupasthāpaye riyaṃ me mātā |
SA20n1396:3012: tasyāpi me piturayaṃ piteti kṣiprataraṃ khalu tāścaturaṅgulamātrāḥ kaṭhikā anenopakrameṇa parikṣayaṃ paryādāna gaccheyuḥ |
SA20n1396:3015: yaccoktaṃ yaṃ yūyaṃ sattvaṃ paśyata duḥkhitaṃ parameṇa duḥkhadaurmanasyena samanvāgataṃ yūyaṃ tatrāvagacchatha asmābhirapyevaṃrūpāṇi duḥkhānyanubhūtāni |
SA20n1396:3017: yathoktaṃ nāhaṃ taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ sulabharūpaṃ paśyāmi yatra yūyaṃ dīrghasyādhvano'
SA20n1396:3019: nāhaṃ taṃ sattvaṃ sulabharūpaṃ paśyāmi yo yuṣmākaṃ dīgha syādhvano'
SA20n1396:3020: tyayātra mātā vābhūt pitā vā bhrātā vā bhaginī vācāryo vopādhyāyo vā gururvā gurusthānīyo veti |
SA20n1396:3023: tadyathā vipulapārśvaḥ parvataḥ sa cetsaṃhato bhavet |
SA20n1396:3037: yathā ca madhyānte sambhūto vartate vyavadānāya ca paraiti ||
SA20n1396:3038: kathaṃ pūrvāntānmadhyānte sambhavati sambhūtaśca madhyānte vartate |
SA20n1396:3039: yathāpīhaikatyena pūrvamaviduṣāvidyāgatenāvidyāpratyayaṃ puṇyāpuṇyāniñjyaṃ kāyavāṅmanaḥkarma kṛtaṃ bhavatyupacitaṃ |
SA20n1396:3041: adhyātmabahirdhā tṛṣṇā cāsya vijñānasya phalābhinirvṛttikāle sahāyabhāvena pratyupasthitā bhavati |
SA20n1396:3043: dhvanyātmabhāvamabhinirvartayatyanupūrveṇa mātuḥ kukṣau hetuvijñānaṃ pratisandhiphalavijñānaṃ yāvadeva kalalatvādibhiravasthāviśeṣairuttarottaraistasya garbhagatasya nāmarūpasya yāvajjīrṇātvāya |
SA20n1396:3044: samanantara pratisandhibandhācca tasya vijñānasya yattadutpattisaṃvartanīyaṃ karma taddattaphalaṃ bhavati vipākataḥ |
SA20n1396:3048: sahabhūtaṃ cendriyarūpaṃ samanantaraviruddhaṃ ca nāma ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānānāṃ yathāyogamāśrayo yadāśritya yāvajjīvaṃ vijñānasya pravṛttirbhavati |
SA20n1396:3051: yacca nāma yenopādattānīndriyāṇi santānapatitaṃ pravāheṇa pravartate |
SA20n1396:3053: evaṃ hi vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ nāmarūpapratyayaṃ ca vijñānaṃ |
SA20n1396:3055: evaṃ hi pūrvāntānmadhyānte saṃskārāṇāṃ pratītyasamutpādasambhavo bhavati |
SA20n1396:3059: rūpiṣu sattveṣu kāmāvacareṣu rūpāvacareṣu aupapādukāyāṃ yonau pūrṇendriyaḥ prādurbhavatītyayaṃ viśeṣaḥ |
SA20n1396:3060: ārūpyeṣu punarnāmāśritaṃ rūpaṃ jīvāśritaṃ ca vijñānaṃ vijñānāśritaṃ nāmarūpabījaṃ ca pravartate |
SA20n1396:3061: yataḥ punarbījātsamucchinnasyāpi rūpasyāyatyāṃ prādurbhāvo bhavatyayamatrāpi viśeṣaḥ |
SA20n1396:3065: kathaṃ madhyāntādaparānte saṃskārāṇāṃ pratītyasamutpādasambhavo bhavati kathaṃ cāsambhavaḥ |
SA20n1396:3067: sa tathā madhyānte sambhūtaḥ pudgalo dvividhaṃ pūrvakarmaphalaṃ pratyanubhavati |
SA20n1396:3068: ādhyātmikaṃ ca vipākaphalaṃ viṣamanirjātaṃ ca veditamadhipatiphalaṃ |
SA20n1396:3071: so'dhyātmaṃ vipākaphale saṃmūḍhaḥ punarbhāvābhinirvṛttiṃ duḥkhato yathābhūtaṃ na jānāti |
SA20n1396:3072: sa pūrvāntikīṃ cāparāntikīṃ cāvidyāmadhipatiṃ kṛtvā pūrvavat |
SA20n1396:3074: tasya tadvijñānamabhinavaṃ karma kurvatastatkarmopagaṃ bhavati dṛṣṭa eva dharme |
SA20n1396:3082: ayaṃ tāvat punarbhavasya madhyānte ākṣepako heturveditavyo yena vijñānādyo veditaparyavasānaḥ kṛtsna evātmabhāva ākṣipto bhavati ||
SA20n1396:3083: sapūrvakeṇa vipākaphalasammohenaiva punarbhavamākṣipya dvitīyena viṣayanirjātaphalasammohena viṣayavedanālambanāṃ tṛṣṇāmutpādayati yathā tṛṣṇayā kāmaparyeṣaṇāṃ vāpadyamāno bhavaparyeṣaṇāṃ vā kāmopādānaṃ vopādadāti dṛṣṭiśīlavrato pādānaṃ vā |
SA20n1396:3084: upātte copādāne tṛṣṇopādānasahitasaṅgataḥ pūrvaka ākṣepako heturbhava ityucyate |
SA20n1396:3085: upapattyabhinirvṛttihetusaṃgṛhītasya ca bhavasyānantaraṃ kālaṃ kṛtavato yathākṣiptenākṣepahetunā vijñānādīnāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ veditaparyantānāṃ prādurbhāvo bhavatyanukramaśo vā sakṛdvā |
SA20n1396:3086: evaṃ dṛṣṭe dharme avidyāsaṃsparśajā veditapratyayā tṛṣṇā |
SA20n1396:3092: evaṃ madhyānte avidyāpratyayān saṃskārān vedanāpratyayāṃ ca tṛṣṇāṃ pratītyāparānte saṃskārāṇāṃ samudayo bhavati |
SA20n1396:3093: sacetpunaḥ parato ghoṣa pūrvasaṃskāraṃ vā dṛṣṭe dharme āgamya yoniśo dvividhānphalabhūtānsaṃskārānmanasi karoti teṣāṃ ca hetuṃ teṣāṃ ca nirodhaṃ teṣāṃ ca nirodhagāminīṃ pratipadaṃ |
SA20n1396:3095: viśuddhaṃ ca satyeṣu krameṇa śaikṣāśaikṣaṃ jñānadarśanaṃ pratilabhate |
SA20n1396:3096: sa tena jñānadarśanenāśeṣāṃ tāṃ cāvidyāṃ prajahāti tāṃ ca tṛṣṇāṃ |
SA20n1396:3100: tasya prahāṇādavidyāvirāgātprajñāvimuktiḥ sākṣātkṛtā bhavati dṛṣṭa eva dharme |
SA20n1396:3101: yā cāvidyāsaṃsparśajā veditasamprayukte citte samprayuktā tṛṣṇā rāgaśca tasya tasmāccittādvisaṃyogād rāgavirahāccetovimuktiḥ sākṣātkṛtā bhavati |
SA20n1396:3102: tasyāvidyānirodhādye te tasyāmaprahīṇāyāmavidyāyāṃ saṃskāravijñānādayo vedanāparyantā aparāntamārabhya te notpadyante |
SA20n1396:3111: apravṛtteśca dṛṣṭe dharme sopadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau nirvāṇaprāptirbhavati |
SA20n1396:3112: tasya tasminsamaye vijñānapratyayaṃ ca nāmarūpaṃ nāmarūpapratyayaṃ ca vijñānaṃ pariśiṣṭaṃ bhavati pariśuddhaṃ paryavadānaṃ |
SA20n1396:3114: vatiṣṭhate tāvadvisaṃyukto vedanāṃ vedayati na saṃyuktaḥ |
SA20n1396:3116: yadā cāsyāyuṣaḥ kṣayādvijñānamupāttaṃ kāyaṃ vijahāti tasya jīvitendriyaṃ cordhvamasmājjīvitendriyādaśeṣaṃ paryādīyate nottaratra vipacyate |
SA20n1396:3117: tacca vijñānaṃ saha sarvaveditairiha ca svasvanirodhādanyatra ca pūrvameva hetunirodhādapratisandhito'
SA20n1396:3119: ayaṃ ca nirupadhiśeṣo nirvāṇadhāturatyantaśāntaṃ padaṃ yasyārthe nirvāṇopagaṃ nirvāṇaparyavasānaṃ bhagavato'
SA20n1396:3121: tadidaṃ tribhirākāraiḥ pratītyasamutpādasya vyavasthānaṃ vistareṇa pratyuktaṃ bhavati |
SA20n1396:3122: pūrvāntānmadhyānte pravṛttito madhyāntādaparānte pravṛttito madhyānte ca pravṛtiviśuddhitaḥ |
SA20n1396:3129: sattvalokacyutyutpattimukhena bhājanalokasaṃvartavivartamukhena āhāropastambhamukhena karmasvakatāmadhipatiṃ kṛtvā iṣṭāniṣṭakarmatadanurūpa phalopabhogamukhena prabhāvamukhena vyavadānamukhena ca |
SA20n1396:3159: adhyātmamayoniśaḥ kathaṃkathībhavataḥ ke santaḥ ke bhaviṣyāmaḥ |
SA20n1396:3178: vitathaṃ karma tatphalaṃ cāyoniśaḥ kalpayato yadajñānaṃ |
SA20n1396:3180: buddhānāṃ bodhimamanasi kurvato vā mithyā vā manasi kurvataḥ pramādyato vā kāṅkṣato vāpavadato vā yadajñānaṃ |
SA20n1396:3182: dharmasya svākhyātatāmamanasi kurvato vā mithyā vā manasi kurvataḥ pramādyato vā kāṅkṣato vāpavadato vā yadajñānaṃ |
SA20n1396:3184: saṅghasya supratipattimamanasi kurvato vā mithyā vā manasi kurvataḥ pramādyato vā kāṅkṣato vāpavadato vā yadajñānaṃ |
SA20n1396:3187: manasi kurvato vā mithyā vā manasi kurvataḥ pramādyato vā kāṅkṣato vāpavadato vā yadajñānāṃ yathā duḥkhe evaṃ samudaye nirodhe mārge ajñānāni draṣṭavyāni ||
SA20n1396:3189: ahetukaṃ vā kalpayato viṣamahetuṃ vā īśvaraprakṛtipuruṣāntarādikaṃ vāyoniśaḥ kalpayato yadajñānaṃ |
SA20n1396:3205: yacca viṃśatividhamajñānaṃ yacca saptavidhamajñānaṃ tatra kena kasya saṃgraho draṣṭavyaḥ |
SA20n1396:3215: yaccaikāntaviṃśatividhamajñānaṃ yacca pañcavidhaṃ katamena kasya saṃgraho draṣṭavyaḥ |
SA20n1396:3218: pramādasaṃmohena karmaṇi vipāke tadubhaye cājñānasya saṃgrahaḥ |
SA20n1396:3223: vidyā itīme ṣaḍavidyāparyāyāḥ saptavidhe saṃmohavastuni yathākramaṃ draṣṭavyāḥ |
SA20n1396:3228: śrutamayyāścintāmayyā bhāvanāmayyāśca prajñāyā vipakṣeṇa trayaḥ paryāyā yathākramaṃ yojyante |
SA20n1396:3229: tasyā eva vipakṣabhūtāyā mṛdumadhyādhimātratvādapare punastrayaḥ paryāyā iti vipakṣaprabhedataśca svabhāvaprabhedataśca ṣaṭ paryāyāḥ ||
SA20n1396:3231: kāyakarma kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ puṇyāpuṇyasaṃkhyātamadha ūrdhvaṃ punarāniñjyasaṃkhyātaṃ |
SA20n1396:3237: tat kāmadhātau puṇyāpuṇyaṃ nāneñjyaṃ dvayoruparimayordhātvorāniñjyameva ca ||
SA20n1396:3239: āyatyāṃ cakṣurindriyāśrayā yā rūpaprativijñaptiryatpuṇyāpuṇyāneñjyaṃ paribhāvitabījabhūtaṃ vijñānaṃ yacca tadbījasamudbhūtaṃ |
SA20n1396:3261: dharmāyatanaparyāpannaṃ ca rūpaṃ daśa kāmāvacarāṇi prajñaptipatitaṃ ca dharmāyatanarūpaṃ aṣṭau rūpāvacarāṇi dharmāyatanaparyāpannaṃ ca |
SA20n1396:3265: cakṣurvijñānasaṃniśrayo rūpaprasādo yena rūpāṇi paśyatpaśyati drakṣyati vā |
SA20n1396:3268: tadapi dvividhaṃ nāmarūpaparigṛhītabījabhūtaṃ tadabhinirvartitaphalabhūtaṃ ca kāmāvacaraṃ |
SA20n1396:3280: yatsukhasthānīyamindriya viṣayaṃ pratītyotpadyate sātaṃ vedayitaṃ vedanāgataṃ |
SA20n1396:3285: yadaduḥkhāsukhasthānīyaṃ dvayaṃ pratītyotpadyate naiva sātaṃ nāsātaṃ vedayitaṃ vedanāgataṃ |
SA20n1396:3288: aduḥkhāsukhā caturthāddhyānādūrdhvaṃ yāvannaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanāt tā api vedanā dvividhāḥ sparśabījaparigṛhītabījabhūtāstadabhinirvartitaphalabhūtāśca ||
SA20n1396:3290: kāmāvacarān saṃskārānpratītya kāmāvacareṣu kliṣṭā prārthanā yathā kāmadhātau duḥkhamabhinirvartayati |
SA20n1396:3292: yā rūpāvacarānsaṃskārānpratītya rūpāvacareṣu saṃskāreṣu kliṣṭā prārthanā yathā rūpadhātau duḥkhamabhinirvartayati |
SA20n1396:3294: yārūpyāvacarānsaṃskārānpratītyārūpyāvacareṣu saṃskāreṣu kliṣṭā prārthanā yayā rūpadhātau duḥkhamabhinirvartayati ||
SA20n1396:3310: narakatiryakpreta manuṣyabhavān sthāpayitvā tadanyo rūpabhavo draṣṭavyaḥ ||
SA20n1396:3313: kimadhikṛtya sapta bhavā vyavasthāpitā narakatiryakpretadevamanuṣya karmāntarābhavāḥ |
SA20n1396:3329: ya āsveva yoniṣvavasthāsu ca pañcānāmupādānaskandhānāṃ sambhavaḥ ||
SA20n1396:3339: yaśca jāteḥ svabhāvaḥ yatra ca jāyate yaiśca hetupratyayaiḥ parigṛhītaḥ yena copastammenāhṛtena sahajena ca dhriyata ityayaṃ samāsārthaḥ |
SA20n1396:3353: yā gamaneryāpathaprabhāvitā kāyasaṃsthānatā tadudbhavā ca gāḍhaśvasanakāmanatā |
SA20n1396:3374: āśrayavipariṇāmaḥ keśavipariṇāmaḥ puṣṭivipariṇāmastejobalavipariṇāma ārogyavipariṇāmo varṇavipariṇāma īryāpathavipariṇāmo'
SA20n1396:3402: yathā ca cyutiḥ cyutasya ca tadūrdhvaṃ yaḥ kālaḥ |
SA20n1396:3421: aparo'nukramaparyāyo dvividhapratyayaṃ pratītyasamutpādamārabhya ātmabhāvapratyayaṃ viṣayopabhogapratyayaṃ ca |
SA20n1396:3428: karmaṇā tadvijñānasahāyena trividhamāyatyāṃ duḥkhamabhinirvartayati indriyanirvṛttisaṃgṛhītaṃ tatparipūrisaṃgṛhītaṃ viṣayaparibhogasaṃgṛhītaṃ ca |
SA20n1396:3429: sparśāvasānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ca dṛṣṭa eva ca dharme sparśapratyayāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ tṛṣṇāmutpādya viṣayapratyayāṃ paryeṣaṇāmāpadyate |
SA20n1396:3431: vyavasāyamukhena lābhasaṃskāramukhena śīlavratamukhena mokṣamukhena kāmaparyeṣaṇāmātmabhāvaparyeṣaṇāṃ mokṣaparyeṣaṇāṃ viṣayaparibhogapratyayaparyeṣaṇāṃ mithyāparyeṣaṇāmāpadyamānaḥ kleśāṃśca tatpūrvakāṇi karmāṇi kṛtvā pañcagatike saṃsāre jāyate jīryati mriyate ca ||
SA20n1396:3435: tatra prathamāḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ nirodhayanti śuklapakṣeṇa na vardhayanti |
SA20n1396:3436: dvitīyāḥ sattvāḥ satyāni yathābhūtamajānānā upasthitasmṛtayaḥ puṇyamāneñjyaṃ ca sāsravaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ karma kṛtvānupasthitayā vā punaḥ smṛtyā puṇyaṃ vipratisāraparibhāvitena vāvipratisāraprāmodyaparibhāvitena vā cetasā bahulaṃ viharanti |
SA20n1396:3439: tṛtīyānāṃ sattvānāṃ pratyutpannaviṣayaparibhogaje vedite vartamānānāṃ pūrvavadaparāṇi ṣaḍaṅgāni kramaśo draṣṭavyāni tṛṣṇādyāni jarāmaraṇāvasānāni ||
SA20n1396:3440: kena kāraṇena pratilomānupūrvyā jarāmaraṇamidaṃ kṛtvā pratītyasamutpādo deśyate satyanayadeśanāmadhikṛtya |
SA20n1396:3443: yaduktaṃ bhagavatā na ca nāmarūpanirodhapūrvaṅgamā dharmā iti |
SA20n1396:3444: kena kāraṇena avidyānirodhapūrvaṅgamā noktāḥ vimukticetasāṃ tatprajñapteḥ |
SA20n1396:3445: ...tvāt teṣāṃ hi dṛṣṭe dharme bījabhūtaṃ vedanāvasānaṃ niruddhaṃ bhavati |
SA20n1396:3446: dṛṣṭe ca dharme vedanāṃ vedayamānasya tṛṣṇānuśayasamuddhātādapravṛtterniruddhā bhavati |
SA20n1396:3451: pratigatya gatiṣu saṃyuktānāṃ kleśairutpādaḥ pratītyasamutpāda ityakṣaranirvacanaṃ |
SA20n1396:3463: tataḥ saiva saṃjñā niruḍhā pratītyasamutpāda iti ||
SA20n1396:3475: yadi hetupratyayena na pratyayāni tatkena kāraṇena hetuphalabhāvena pratītyasamutpādo nirdiśyate |
SA20n1396:3482: dṛṣṭe ca dharme samparāye ca vijñānādīni vedanāvasānāni jātijarāmaraṇāvasāni ||
SA20n1396:3484: yadā yoniśomanaskārahetukā vidyoktā kena kāraṇena sa pratītyasamutpādanirdeśa ādito na nirdiṣṭaḥ |
SA20n1396:3489: avidyā ca svabhāvasaṃkliṣṭā ayoniśo manaskāraśca svabhāvasaṃkliṣṭaḥ |
SA20n1396:3495: kena kāraṇena svabhāvaḥ svabhāvasya pratyayatvena noktaḥ |
SA20n1396:3496: nahi svabhāvaḥ pratyayāntaramalabhamānaḥ svabhāvasya saṃkleśataḥ poṣako vā bhāvako vā bhavati |
SA20n1396:3498: kena kāraṇena puṇyāneñjyāḥ saṃskārā pratisaṃkhyāya manukṛtā avidyāpratyayā ityucyante |
SA20n1396:3502: yadā lobhadveṣamohanidānaṃ karmoktaṃ tatkena kāraṇena mohanidānamevocyate |
SA20n1396:3505: yadā cetanāsamutthāpitatvātkāyavākkarmaṇaḥ saṃskārapratyayā abhisaṃskārā kena kāraṇenāvidyāpratyayā evocyante |
SA20n1396:3507: yadā vijñānaṃ nāmarūpapratyayamapi kena kāraṇenāsminnarthe saṃskārapratyayamevocyate |
SA20n1396:3510: yadā nāmarūpaṃ mahābhūtānyupādāya sparśamapi kena kāraṇena vijñānapratyayamevocyate |
SA20n1396:3511: vijñānasya tadabhinavotpattihetutvānmahābhūtāni sparśaśca kevalamutpannasya pratiṣṭhāheturbhavatyutpattikāle ca yadā ṣaḍ dhātūnpratītya mātuḥ kukṣau garbhasyāvakrāntiruktā kena kāraṇena vijñānadhāturevoktaḥ |
SA20n1396:3512: sati hi vijñānadhātau niyataṃ mātuḥ kukṣau śukraśoṇitamahābhūtakukṣi cchidrāvaikalyātpradhāno vijñānadhāturiti kṛtvā sarvayonibhavotpattyadhikārācca ||
SA20n1396:3516: yadā trikasamavāyapratyayaḥ sparśaḥ kena kāraṇena ṣaḍāyatanapratyaya evoktaḥ |
SA20n1396:3517: sati ṣaḍāyatane tadanyadvayāvaikalyātṣaḍāyatanapradhānaṃ pradhānamiti kṛtvā dvayasaṃgrahācca ṣaḍāyatanasya ||
SA20n1396:3518: yadātmopakramikāḥ paropakramikā ṛtuvipariṇāmikā pūrvakarmāhṛtāśca vedanā upalabhyante kena kāraṇeneha sparśapratyayā eva paridīpitāḥ |
SA20n1396:3520: sparśāhārakatvācca tadanyeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ tā api vedanāḥ |
SA20n1396:3522: yadā tṛṣṇāvidyāpratyayāpyuktā tatsthānīyaviṣayapratyayā ca kena kāraṇeneha vedanāpratyayaivoktā |
SA20n1396:3523: yasmādvedanāvaśādviṣayasaṃyogaprārthanā pravartate tadupame viṣaye mohavaśāttu kevalaṃ tāsāṃ vedanānāṃ samudayāstaṅgādīnyathābhūtamaprajānantastataścittaṃ na nivārayanti ||
SA20n1396:3524: yadānuśayādaprahīṇāntasthānīyebhyaśca dharmasya upādānasya prabhavo bhavati kena kāraṇeneha tṛṣṇāpratyayamevopādānamucyate |
SA20n1396:3529: upādānabalena yasmāttadeva karma tasmiṃstasminnupapattyāyatane vijñānanāmarūpādyākarṣaṇa samarthaṃ bhavati |
SA20n1396:3530: yadā śukraśoṇitādipratyayāpi jātiḥ kena kāraṇena bhavapratyayaivoktā |
SA20n1396:3531: bhave sati niyataṃ tadanyapratyayāvaikalyasadbhāvāt sa eva pradhānaḥ pratyaya iti kṛtvā |
SA20n1396:3562: kena kāraṇena vijñānādīni vedanāvasānāni jātijarāmaraṇāni ca dvidhākhyātāni |
SA20n1396:3581: avidyā saṃskārāṇāṃ kiṃ sahabhāvena pratyayaḥ athānantaraniruddhaḥ pratyayaḥ |
SA20n1396:3618: yathā bhavo jāterevaṃ jātirjarāmaraṇasya pratyayatvena draṣṭavyā |
SA20n1396:3620: pradhānāṅgatastathopādānaparigṛhītasya karmaṇo yathāpūrvanirdiṣṭaṃ sakalāṅgataḥ karmaṇo vijñānādīnāṃ ca vedanāvasānānāṃ bījabhūtānāmupādānaparigṛhītānāṃ bhavato vyavasthānaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ |
SA20n1396:3621: kimeṣāṃ bhavāṅgānāmetadeva karma yaduta saṃskārādīnāṃ jarāmaraṇāvasānānāmanupūrvapratyayatvamathānyadapi kiñcit |
SA20n1396:3622: etacca sve sve gocare ca sarveṣāṃ yathāyogaṃ vṛttirdvitīyaṃ karma draṣṭavyaṃ |
SA20n1396:3624: avidyā yāvajjarāmaraṇasyāpi pratyayaḥ samāsannapratyayārthena punaḥ saṃskārāṇāmeva nirdiṣṭā ||
SA20n1396:3635: kena kāraṇena jātyāṃ satyāṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ bhavati |
SA20n1396:3638: kena kāraṇena jātyāṃ satyāṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ nānyatra jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇamucyate |
SA20n1396:3640: anenaiva vyapadeśena svasāntānikātpratyayāt svasantāna eva tadanyotpādārthena ||
SA20n1396:3641: ye dharmā avidyāpratyayena saṃskārā api te |
SA20n1396:3642: ye vā saṃskārā avidyāpratyayā api te syuḥ |
SA20n1396:3643: saṃskārā nāvidyāpratyayā anāsravā anivṛtāvyākṛtāśca kāyavāṅmanaḥsaṃskārāḥ syuravidyāpratyayā na saṃskārāḥ |
SA20n1396:3644: saṃskārasaṃgṛhītaṃ bhavāṅgaṃ sthāpayitvā yāni tadanyāni bhavāṅgāni |
SA20n1396:3646: puṇyānejyāḥ kāyavāṅmanaḥsaṃskārāḥ etānākārān sthāpayitvā ca caturthī koṭiḥ |
SA20n1396:3654: vijñānaṃ ca saṃskārapratyayaṃ ca yatpaunarbhavikaṃ bījabhūtaṃ phalabhūtaṃ vā |
SA20n1396:3661: uttare vimokṣe yā prārthanā yāṃ ca tṛṣṇāṃ kuśalaṃ niśritya tṛṣṇāṃ prajahāti |
SA20n1396:3663: vidyāsaṃsparśajāṃ vedanāṃ pratītya ye tadanye dharmā utpadyante |
SA20n1396:3665: vedanāpratyayā ca tṛṣṇā ca kliṣṭā tṛṣṇā avidyāsaṃsparśajaveditapratyayā ||
SA20n1396:3669: atra paścātpadakaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ yattāvadupādānaṃ sarvaṃ tattṛṣṇāpratyayaṃ syāttu tṛṣṇāpratyayaṃ nopādānaṃ |
SA20n1396:3671: ye ca kuśalāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ pratītya ārabdhavīryādayaḥ kuśalā dharmā utpadyante ||
SA20n1396:3673: yo vā bhavaḥ sarvaḥ sa upādānapratyayaḥ |
SA20n1396:3678: yā yā bhavapratyayā sarvā sā jātiḥ |
SA20n1396:3679: yā vā jātiḥ sarvā sā bhavapratyayā |
SA20n1396:3688: eṣāṃ bhavāṅgānāṃ kati samyagdṛṣṭisaṃgṛhītasya mārgasyāṅgāni prādhānyena vibandhabhūtāni |
SA20n1396:3690: yathā samyagdṛṣṭerevaṃ samyaksaṃkalpasya samyagvyāyāmasya samyagvyāyāmasya samyagvākkarmāntājīvānāṃ kāyavāksaṃskārā bhavaikadeśaśca vibandhabhūtaḥ |
SA20n1396:3692: eṣāṃ bhavāṅgānāṃ katyaṅgānyekāntena saṃkleśapakṣyāṇi kati saṃkleśavyavadānapakṣyāṇi |
SA20n1396:3695: jātiryāpāyeṣvakṣaṇeṣu vā tadanyeṣu vā sā saṃkleśapakṣyā |
SA20n1396:3696: yā punardevamanuṣyeṣvakṣaṇavivarjiteṣu jātiḥ sā saṃkleśavyavadānapakṣyā draṣṭavyā |
SA20n1396:3701: avidyānirodhādavidyānirodhe tannirodhācca tannirodhe sati tataḥ saṃskāranirodhaḥ ||
SA20n1396:3714: yathā vijñānanāmarūpayornayastathā yathāyogamavaśiṣṭānāmaṅgānāṃ draṣṭavyo yāvad vedanāvasānāt |
SA20n1396:3715: yathā'vidyāpratyayānāṃ saṃskārāṇāmevaṃ tṛṣṇāpratyayasyopādānasya upādānapratyayasya ca bhavasya draṣṭavyaḥ ||
SA20n1396:3717: yathā vijñānapratyayānāṃ nāmarūpādīnāṃ tathā jātipratyayasya jarāmaraṇasya ||
SA20n1396:3720: yathā saṃskārapratyayasya vijñānasya tathāsyāpi nayo draṣṭavyaḥ ||
SA20n1396:3721: yo'sāvaṣṭamukhaḥ pratītyasamutpāda uktasteṣāṃ kati mukhāni dvādaśāṅgapratītyasamutpādaprabhāvitāni |
SA20n1396:3733: yathā pūrvāntasahagatānyevamaparāntasahagatāni pūrvāntāparāntasahagatāni sthāmaśaḥ parāmarśasthāyī sopādānaḥ saparitāpanaḥ |
SA20n1396:3734: na dṛṣṭe dharme parinirvātyayaṃ pañcama ādīnavaḥ ||
SA20n1396:3759: vedanāvyāmiśranirdeśyā sāmparāyikī ca sparśapratyayā hetubhūtā dṛṣṭadhārmikī ca |
SA20n1396:3761: te come sparśapratyaye kṛtvā vyāmiśre nirdiśyete ||
SA20n1396:3778: yāni duḥkhasahagatāni yaccāvedanāsahagatamaṅgaṃ tasya ca pradeśaḥ ||
SA20n1396:3781: syāttu saṃskāraduḥkhatayā saṃgṛhītāni na tadanyābhyāṃ duḥkhatābhyāṃ |
SA20n1396:3785: asaṃjñikaṃ nirodhasamāpattyasaṃjñisamāpattyośca rūpīṇyupalabhyante nārūpīṇi ārūpyeṣūpapannasya punararūpīṇyupalabhyante na rūpīṇi ||
SA20n1396:3807: yānyaṅgāni kuśalasāsravāṇi tāni kiṃ na śaikṣāṇi |
SA20n1396:3809: śaikṣasya tu kuśalasāsravā dharmāḥ pravṛtivairodhikā vidyāpratyayāśca |
SA20n1396:3819: katibhirnirdeśaiḥ pratītyasamutpādo nirdiśyate teṣu teṣu sūtrānteṣu |
SA20n1396:3821: anulomanirdeśena pratilomanirdeśena ekadeśāṅganirdeśena sakalāṅganirdeśena kṛṣṇapakṣanirdeśena śuklapakṣanirdeśena ||
SA20n1396:3829: na ca bījapratyayayostajjananaṃ prati kācidīhā vā ceṣṭā vā vyāpāro vā vidyate |
SA20n1396:3830: naca bījapratyayayorīhā vā ceṣṭā vā vyāpāro vā vidyate |
SA20n1396:3832: anādipratiṣiddhalakṣaṇāni cāṅgāni pratikṣaṇaṃ ca nava-nava-lakṣaṇāni pravartante |
SA20n1396:3835: tatra duḥkhārthamārabhya duḥkhaikarasalakṣaṇāni cāṅgāni triprakāratayā ca khyānti |
SA20n1396:3836: tatra śūnyārthamārabhya sattvakārakaduḥkhavirahitāni cāṅgāni tadavirahitānīva ca khyānti nirdiśyante ca ||
SA20n1396:3848: na haiva mayā pratītyasamutpādaḥ kṛto nāpyanyairapi tūtpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā sthitaiveyaṃ dharmatā dharmasthitidharmadhāturiti |
SA20n1396:3849: katamā dharmatā katamā dharmasthitiḥ katamo dharmadhātuḥ |
SA20n1396:3854: yaduktaṃ jātiścenna syādapi nu kasyacitkasmiṃścideva jātiḥ syāt |
SA20n1396:3855: sarvaśo vā jātyāmasatyāṃ jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ prajñāyeteti |
SA20n1396:3858: yasmiṃśca sati paścāttānyeva phalabhūtāni bhavapratyayā jātirityucyate ||
SA20n1396:3860: yathā sarveṣāmaṅgānāṃ nānyonyapratyayatvamuktaṃ kena kāraṇena nāmarūpavijñānayoranyonyapratyayatvaṃ vyavasthāpyate |
SA20n1396:3864: mātṛkukṣau pratisandhikāle anyonyapratyayatvādvijñānapratyayairmātuḥ kukṣau śukraśoṇitarūpaṃ nāma parigṛhītaṃ kalalatvāya sammūrchate |
SA20n1396:3866: kena kāraṇena bodhisattvasya kṛṣṇapakṣaṃ vyavalokayato vijñānātpratyudāvartate mānasaṃ na tvanyebhyo'ṅgebhyaḥ |
SA20n1396:3868: tasya yathā vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpapratyayaṃ vijñānaṃ vyavalokayato vijñānātpratyudāvṛttaṃ |
SA20n1396:3871: nivṛttipakṣe tu nāmarūpe na paunarbhavikasya vijñānasya nivṛttiheturyena paraḥ pratyavekṣitavān ||
SA20n1396:3872: kena kāraṇena svayaṃkṛtāni na parakṛtāni nobhayakṛtāni nāpyahetusamutpannānyetānyaṅgānyucyante |
SA20n1396:3887: kena kāraṇena kṛṣṇapakṣanirdeśataḥ pratītyasamutpāda ācaya ityucyate |
SA20n1396:3902: katīnāmaṃgānāṃ nirodhaḥ vedanākṣayaprabhāvitaḥ prahīṇeṣu kleśeṣu skandhanirodhakāla ihaiva sarvaveditoparamādekasya ||
SA20n1396:3904: sahetukasaṃkleśajñānodbhāvanārthaṃ ca svasantatau svayaṃkṛtakleśodbhāvanārthaṃ ca pūrvāntādaṅgānāmanādikālatvodbhāvanārthaṃ ca aparāntādaṅgānāṃ saṃkleśanivṛttyavakāśodbhāvanārthaṃ ca |
SA20n1396:3909: tatra kāmadhātau jāto bhūtaḥ kāmāvacareṇāśrayeṇordhvabhūmikaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ cābhinirharati |
SA20n1396:3912: traidhātukāvacaraṃ punarmanastenaivāśrayeṇa saṃmukhīkarotyaparyāpannaṃ ca rūpārūpyadhātau jāto'
SA20n1396:3914: asya khalu trividhasya saṃkleśasya kleśasaṃkleśasya karmasaṃkleśasya janmasaṃkleśasya ca prahāṇāya ṣaḍvidho'
SA20n1396:3920: yogācārabhūmau savitarkā savicārā avitarkā vicāramātrā avitarkāvicārā bhūmiḥ samāptā ||
